description.hltext_display: تخصيص 47 مليار ريال لصناديق التنمية مؤشر بأن عبئها بات أقل على الموازنة
description.content:
أكد اقتصاديون بأن مبلغ الـ47 مليار ريال الذي خُصص لصناديق التنمية في موازنة 2011 يعكس التوجه نحو تعزيز دعم هذه الصناديق كما يؤكد أن بعضها أصبح عبئه أقل على الموازنة وتوقعوا بأن يستحوذ الصندوقان «العقاري» و»الاستثمارات العامة» على الكعكة الأكبر فيما تم تخصيصه لصناديق التنمية وقال رئيس مركز الفريق الأول للدراسات الاقتصادية الدكتور عبدالله باعشن: يبدو أن هناك مراجعة عامة لأدوارها خاصة وأنها تنقسم إلى نوعين الأول يهدف إلى التنمية الإنتاجية والآخر يهدف إلى التنمية الاقتصادية من الناحية الاجتماعية، وأضاف: الرقم الذي تم تخصيصه كبير فعلا كما أنه يكشف بأن هناك بعض الصناديق بدأت تستعيد جزءا من قروضها وبالتالي أصبح عبئها أقل على الموازنة ورأى الدكتور باعشن أن هذه الصناديق ليس مناط بها سد الفراغ التمويلي أو القيام بهذا الدور وأيد باعشن رأي الكثير من الاقتصاديين الذين يرون تحويلها إلى صناديق تجارية أجدى وأنفع إذا ما تم تجاوز بعض الأوضاع الاقتصادية التي تتطلب قيامها بهذا الدور.
وتوقع باعشن أن يحصل صندوق الاستثمارات العامة على النسبة الأكبر من هذا المبلغ وبخاصة أنه يؤدي دوره بشكل أكبر حيث إن الدولة تدخل كشريك في الاستثمارات وهذا ما يميزه نظرا إلى أن المستثمرين في الدول النامية لا يتوجهون إلى الاستثمارات طويلة المدى فتقوم الدول بهذا الدور أضف إلى ذلك أن هناك توجها لدى الدولة للاستثمار المستقبلي وهنا تجد أن هذا الصندوق يؤدي دوره بدفع الاقتصاد ليكون اقتصادا حيويا وهذا ما نحتاجه.
من جانبه قال أستاذ الاستثمار والتمويل بجامعة الملك سعود الدكتور محمد الجبرين إن هذا الرقم والزيادة الكبيرة فيه ستساعد على تقليص حجم الفجوة التمويلية بخاصة في تمويل المشاريع الجديدة وهذا يوضح لنا حجم الدعم الموجه من الدولة للقطاع الخاص ومن المؤكد أن هذا المبلغ سيكون له دور كبير خلال الفترة القادمة بتقليص هذه الفجوة.
وتوقع الجبرين أن توجه النسبة الأكبر من هذا المبلغ إلى صندوق التنمية العقاري لسد الفجوة بين العرض والطلب في الوحدات السكانية خاصة وان هناك توصية من مجلس الشورى برفع قيمة القرض إلى 500 ألف ريال وكذلك استبعاد شرط تملك الأرض فمن المؤكد أن حجم الطلب سيرتفع وأيضا نظرا لسعي الدولة إلى مواجهة مشكلة الإسكان وتخفيض الفجوة بين العرض والطلب إضافة إلى أن الدعم يجب أن يتواكب مع حجم النمو السكاني وتمنى الجبرين أن تضبط عملية التحصيل فيه بشكل أكبر بالرغم من تحسنها في الآونة الأخيرة، وتوقع أن يأتي صندوق الاستثمارات بالدرجة الثانية وبخاصة أنه يمول مشاريع عملاقة ويدخل كشريك في مشاريع استثمارية طويلة المدى إضافة إلى أنه الأقدر على تحقيق عوائد وأخيرا الصندوق الصناعي الذي يعتبر أحد أهم الداعمين للاستثمار.
بينما رأى الدكتور باعشن بأن تحويل الجزء الأكبر إلى الصندوق العقاري وبخاصة أنه اقتصاديا يخدم الطبقة الأقل من المتوسطة وبالتالي فدوره اجتماعي أكثر من اقتصادي وتحفظ باعشن على أداء هذا الصندوق تاريخيا حيث انه مر بمشاكل في تحصيل القروض وقال: بما أننا في السنة الثانية من خطة التنمية التاسعة فأخالف هذا الرأي واعتقد أن الجزء الأكبر من هذه المبالغ سيوجه إلى الصناديق التي تضيف إلى الاقتصاد مثل صندوق الاستثمارات العامة أما عملية القضاء على فجوة العرض والطلب على المساكن فلا أعتقد أن الصندوق العقاري قادرا على معالجتها وتوجه الدولة إلى سد الفجوة من خلال مشاريع طموحة لهيئة الإسكان ولنا أن نتذكر أن الدولة لا تسعى إلى منافسة القطاع الخاص، ولذلك أعتقد أن التوجيه السليم سيكون إلى صندوق الاستثمارات حيث إن الاستفادة ستكون أكبر من خلال استعادة الأموال وتحقيق العوائد.

description.hltext_display: Cash loans online: Open Possibility to Tackle with Any Fiscal Crisis
description.content:
Man's life is not ruled by money or any other fiscal support but sometimes, some unfavorable and unforeseen fiscal problems can take place in your lives that need quick treatment. But as the cash loans online have been intended just to give you a quick cash back up, you have great chances to smile in any adverse condition. So, feel relaxed when an emergency comes to you and you are totally out of funds. Just open the door of money by applying for the cash loans online that will do miracle for you!
Cash loans online are available in both of the secured and unsecured forms and you can get rid of any small or long term need. If there is need of big loan sum and there is no problem of placing collateral, the secured cash loans will be the worth choice to opt for. On the other hand, the unsecured loans will be the perfect tools in your hand to cover any cash crunch with ease. As they are approved in the both forms, the arranged loan amount is arranged according to loan nature. The loan sum arranged by cash loans online ranges from 100 pounds to 25000 pounds with repayment duration of one month to 10 years.
Opt for the hassle-free online mode of getting cash support, as these loans are quickly sanctioned by the online lenders. They don't ask you to wait for fiscal help for more than 24 hours, if the form is filled up with the right information. In case, there is no proper information, the process can take a while, so beware of filling out the application form!

description.hltext_display: Pros, contras
description.content:
J.J. Barea contento por la llegada de Pitino
Tags: basquetbol, nba (generic), dallas mavericks
SAN JUAN, Puerto Rico -- A pesar de que Rick Pitino es catalogado como uno de los mejores técnicos colegiales de Estados Unidos, su nombramiento como dirigente de la escuadra nacional de Puerto Rico para los compromisos internacionales en el 2011 fue recibido con opiniones conflictivas.
El compromiso de Pitino comienza con el evento preolímpico que definirá dos plazas para la máxima justa mundial a celebrarse en el 2012 en Inglaterra.
En conferencia de prensa celebrada en la sede del Comité Olímpico de Puerto Rico (COPUR), varios líderes deportivos del país endosaron la firma del cotizado mentor para sustituir al nativo Manolo Cintrón. Entre los que ocuparon la mesa presidencial estaban el Dr. David E. Bernier, máximo líder del deporte en el país, así como los licenciados Henry Neumann, Secretario de Recreación y Deportes; Carlos J. Beltrán, presidente y director general de la Federación de Baloncesto y Jenaro 'Tuto' Marchand, secretario eméritos de FIBA América, máximo rector del deporte del balón y el aro en el hemisferio.
Todos avalaron y aprobaron la contratación de Pitino, lo que marcará el regreso de un técnico estadounidense a la escuadra boricua, la cual es valorada por miles de fanáticos en la llamada Isla del Encanto. Será la primera ocasión desde 1987 que un coach definido como extranjero asuma las riendas del quinteto, que por última vez lo piloteó el reconocido Gene Bartow en los Juegos Panamericanos de ese año en Indianápolis.
La justificación para la importante movida se debe, según explicaron de forma independiente cada líder, es la no clasificación directa de Puerto Rico en los últimos torneos clasificatorios de mayor envergadura. Los boricuas han jugado en las pasados Mundiales y Olimpiadas, pero han sido por invitación y no por derecho adquirido. El último evento clasificatorio por mérito propio fue en el preolímpico de 2003 jugado en San Juan, que les permitió ver acción en justa celebrada en Atenas, Grecia, en la que finalizaron en una sexta posición.
"Para la Federación, la posibilidad de tener un equipo del prestigio y nivel de Rick Pitino, nos traen grandes emociones, ya que hacemos una aportación no sólo al baloncesto sino al pueblo de Puerto Rico, dijo Beltrán, sobre el nuevo técnico, considerado uno de los mejores a nivel colegial.
El líder del baloncesto en la Isla aprovechó la ocasión para anunciar a su vez que Pitino recibirá en la Universidad de Louisville a seis candidatos del patio, que serán evaluados para definir quién será la persona escogida para fungir como uno de sus asistentes. Los elegidos, que no fueron identificados, se dividirán en dos grupos para ir en dos fines de semana, el primero del 23 al 25 de enero y el segundo del 11 al 13 de febrero, para participar en los entrenamientos de la prestigiosa institución.
"Así tendremos un paso de avance para poder trabajar con los jugadores", explicó sobre la persona seleccionado, que deberá seguir un plan para darle seguimiento a los diferentes jugadores en Puerto Rico, mientras el técnico en propiedad se integra con todo su grupo de trabajo. Se espera que Pitino llegue al país en abril para ver algunos partidos del campeonato local del Baloncesto Superior Nacional, para luego convocar a los 10 canasteros en adición a los enebeístas Carlos Arroyo y José Juan Barea, quienes se acuartelarán en los Estados Unidos antes de la primera competencia oficial en agosto del 2011.
Una de las figuras principales en el reclutamiento de Pitino lo fue el empresario Joel Katz, apoderado de los Gigantes de Carolina, quien inició todas las gestiones para contactar al reputado dirigente norteamericano. Al momento de que ESPN Deportes le pidiera su comentario sobre el beneficio de traer a un dirigente extranjero de regreso al Equipo Nacional, no titubeó al resaltar las cualidades del técnico.
"Hay grandes dirigentes puertorriqueños y de otras nacionalidades, y quiero quitar que la decisión se tomó basado en cualquier nacionalidad. Nosotros como Federación y parte del equipo de trabajo de Carlos Beltrán, tratamos de conseguir el mejor dirigente que estaba disponible", explicó el también dirigente del quinteto gigante.
"En términos técnicos, en los tiempos que estamos viviendo hoy, Rick Pitino es un gran dirigente con un gran pedigree que va a poder aportar mucho al desarrollo, no sólo a nuestros jugadores de baloncesto, sino a nuestro coaches", abundó sobre dos de los beneficios del fichaje del ex coach de los Knicks de Nueva York y Celtas de Boston de la NBA. "Los técnicos jóvenes se van a poder acoplar al sistema organizativo", añadió, al tiempo que dejaba claro que esto no necesariamente signifique que los dirigentes de afuera sean mejores que los del patio.
Cuando se le preguntó sobre la presión que podría tener Pitino, quien se alega no cobrará por sus servicios, ante las expectativas que tiene la gerencia del conjunto de clasificar a Londres 2012, ciudad que será la sede de las Olimpiadas, Katz fue claro al decir que sí existe.
"Él sabe que hay presión y está acostumbrado a la presión. Nuestra meta primordial y objetivo en los próximos 10 u 12 meses, es el clasificatorio en Argentina y los Panamericanos en Guadalajara, México en octubre", dijo sobre los dos compromisos grandes del 2011, el primero que es el torneo preolímpico.
Katz también aceptó que para los Panamericanos, es casi seguro que un dirigente local asuma nuevamente la dirección, ante la cercanía del comienzo de los entrenamientos de la NCAA. Además reconoció lo difícil que será que tanto Arroyo como Barea puedan estar presentes en el evento, al igual que otros jugadores, los primeros por sus compromisos en la NBA, y los otros por sus contratos en ligas profesionales en diferentes lugares del mundo.
El veterano y más ganador mentor a nivel local, Julio Toro, quien ha trabajado como asistente y dirigente del conjunto boricua, y que también dirigió a los equipos de Venezuela y República Dominicana, reconoce que "en este trabajo nos evalúan por los resultados. Hubo una oferta y una aceptación sobre ella, que ambas partes se van a beneficiar del reto que tiene el entrenador y la ilusión de mejores resultados de cara al preolímpico que se va a celebrar en Argentina".
"Es una idea que hay que respetarla de las personas que dirigen el baloncesto en Puerto Rico", dijo sobre el regreso de un coach anglosajón después de 33 años, según calculó. "Ha sucedido muchísimas veces y ellos fueron los maestros, y están interactuando con nosotros desde los años 40. Se ha ganado y perdido, por lo que ahora estamos atentos y confiados en que todo salga bien con resultados positivos para regresar a las Olimpiadas", explicó.
Toro, sin embargo, indicó que la tarea de Pitino no será fácil, ya que sólo 12 equipos clasifican a las Olimpiadas, la mitad de los que juegan en los Campeonatos Mundiales donde participan 24. Y en el caso de la región de América sólo hay dos plazas disponibles, sumado a la de Estados Unidos que por ser el campeón mundial no tiene que buscar su pasaporte a Londres.
Sobre lo difícil que pudiera ser para una persona ajena, en este caso Pitino, el poder trabajar con el equipo y los jugadores, el mentor de los Vaqueros de Bayamón en el campeonato local entiende que "no sea difícil poder trabajar con un equipo" por la capacidad emocional de los componentes.
Recordó que la mayoría del grupo ha participado en otros talleres como Europa, la NBA y América, por lo que están capacitados para trabajar con cualquier entrenador. Pero, sin querer ser pesimista, sabe que por la forma de trabajar en Puerto Rico, se le hará difícil al nuevo dirigente.
"A mí se me hizo difícil y a otros entrenadores también. Las formas que se han hecho otras veces, es muy atropellado", cuestionó sobre la forma de aglutinar a los jugadores de cara a cualquier compromiso. "Para las Olimpiadas de Australia, lo que tuve fueron nueve días de trabajo", dijo sobre la selección de Venezuela. "En otras ocasiones he tenido dos semanas y hay ausencias. La mayor parte del tiempo, incluso para Manolo y Flor, es atípico ya que no tiene la fortaleza mental ya que estamos trabajando en otros lugares y no es fácil".
Pero a pesar de que las experiencias no fueron muy agradables, Toro confía en el compromiso de los jugadores, aun cuando el dirigente no sea puertorriqueño. "Quizás (ahora) los atletas pongan un poco más de su parte, ya que ellos son los que tienen que dar esa milla extra", puntualizó.
Se trató de conseguir una reacción del saliente dirigente de la escuadra, Manolo Cintrón, pero fue imposible ya que se encuentra cumpliendo compromisos en la liga profesional de México.

description.hltext_display: Gay Killings Put Back on U.N. Rights Agenda after U.S. Campaign
description.content:
(NewsCore) - The UN General Assembly on Tuesday voted to put gays and lesbians back on a list of vulnerable minorities who should be protected from unjustified killings following a major US-led diplomatic campaign.
A mainly Arab and African-led move had killings over "sexual orientation" taken off a list of people unfairly targeted, when an biannual resolution was discussed by a UN rights committee last month.
The US government said it was "incensed" and launched a major campaign with European and other nations to get "sexual orientation" killings put back on the blacklist when the vote came before the full UN General Assembly.
"Today, the United Nations General Assembly has sent a clear and resounding message that justice and human rights apply to all individuals regardless of their sexual orientation," said US ambassador Susan Rice after the 93-55 vote.
"The voices of civil society and human rights defenders around the world have been heard today, and for that my delegation is especially proud," Rice added.
Since 1999 the resolution has called for thorough investigation of "all killings committed for any discriminatory reason, including sexual orientation."
According to Human Rights Watch, it was the only UN resolution in the field with an explicit reference to sexual orientation.
Benin, supported by Morocco, introduced the amendment which was narrowly passed at the UN General Assembly rights committee on November 16.
Boris Dittrich, director of Human Rights Watchâs Lesbian, Gay, Bisexual and Transgender program, commented: "Countries that tried to roll back crucial protections for gay and lesbian people have been defeated."
He added: "Hate crimes on the basis of sexual orientation or gender identity must be countered just like hate crimes on the basis of race or religion."

description.hltext_display: Food Bank campaign gets $100,000 from Citizens Bank Foundation
description.content:
Berwick Eliot Kittery North Berwick Lebanon South Berwick York
Go Mobile: http://mobile.fosters.com
MANCHESTER — The New Hampshire Food Bank has announced that the Citizens Bank Foundation has donated a $100,000 grant to the Food Bank's community campaign.
Cathy Schmidt, President of Citizens Bank New Hampshire, is co-chairing the campaign. This leadership grant of $100,000 from the Citizens Foundation will support the Recipe for Success job training kitchen, where students who are unemployed or underemployed gain valuable work skills to earn a living wage. Through the eight-week culinary job training program, adult students learn the ins and outs of working in a busy commercial kitchen as they prepare nearly 2,000 hot meals each week for Food Bank agencies.
These meals go on to feed the hungry in New Hampshire, and students gain classroom knowledge and hands-on experience. Much more than a warehouse, the Food Bank's new location at 700 East Industrial Park Drive in Manchester allows the program to focus on direct service, innovative programs, and solutions to address hunger at its root causes. The campaign will run through 2011.
For further information, contact Lisa Merrill-Burzak, vice president of development at NH Catholic Charities, at (603) 669-3030, Ext. 240.

description.hltext_display: Dangdang to diversify from books, plans expansion
description.content:
Online retailer Dangdang Inc, considered as China's answer to Amazon.com, aims for sales of general merchandise to exceed that of books and other media as it diversifies in the highly competitive e-commerce sector.
Media products, including books and DVDs, make up about 84 percent of Dangdang's sales, with the remainder from other consumer products such as cosmetics, furniture, shoes and toys.
"There is no doubt that sales from general merchandise are going to rise faster than books, and will eventually exceed books," co-founder and Chairwoman Peggy Yu told Reuters via telephone in Beijing on Wednesday.
Yu also said the company had no plans to tap overseas markets, but would focus on China, where its 1.3 billion population is becoming increasingly affluent on the back of strong economic growth.
"It's hard to find another massive market like China where there is one language and a common consumer culture, apart from the United States in the 50s and 60s," she said. "If we can serve mainland customers really well, our business will have many years of development."
Dangdang shares have fallen by almost 30 percent since hitting a closing high of $32.79 days after its trading debut on December 8, as concern over its competitiveness in China's highly fragmented e-commerce sector.
(Reporting by Huang Yuntao and Lee Chyen Yee; Editing by Chris Lewis)

description.hltext_display: مناقشة استراتيجية وكالة البحث العلمي في جامعة الملك سعود
description.content:
عقدت اللجنة الاستشارية للبحث العلمي للوكالة في جامعة الملك سعود اجتماعها الـ13 الخاص بمناقشة المسودة الأولية لاستراتيجية الوكالة في مقر الجامعة في الدرعية، وعبر النقل المباشر لأقسام العلوم والدراسات الطبية في الملز، وذلك في حضور وكيل جامعة الملك سعود للدراسات العليا والبحث العلمي الدكتور علي الغامدي.
وفي بداية الاجتماع رحب وكيل الجامعة للدراسات العليا والبحث العلمي بالحضور، وأكد أهمية إنجاز استراتيجية الوكالة وأن تكون متوائمة مع استراتيجية الجامعة واستراتيجيات العمادات التابعة للوكالة.
وناقش الاجتماع الإطار العام لاستراتيجية الوكالة ومؤشرات الأداء التي يمكن قياسها عند تنفيذ الاستراتيجية وتحديد الجامعات المرجعية ذات السمعة العالمية في الدراسات العليا والبحث العلمي مثل جامعة Oxford وMIT والجامعة الوطنية السنغافورية، وكذلك تحديد المبادرات والمشاريع التي سيتم إدراجها ضمن استراتيجية الوكالة.
وقد حضر الاجتماع مساعد وكيل الجامعة للدراسات العليا والبحث العلمي لشؤون البحث العلمي رئيس اللجنة الاستشارية للبحث العلمي في الوكالة الدكتور عبد العزيز الخضيري وأعضاء وعضوات اللجنة وعمداء العمادات المساندة.
وفي ختام الاجتماع شكر وكيل الجامعة للدراسات العليا والبحث العلمي أعضاء اللجنة، على جهودهم المبذولة.

description.hltext_display: Futterneid und Schleckalarm beim "V.I.P. Hundeprofi"!/ VOX zeigt ab 15. Januar die zweite ...
description.content:
Köln (ots) - Die erfolgreiche VOX-Coaching-Doku "Der V.I.P. Hundeprofi" meldet sich am Samstag, 15. Januar 2011 um 19:10 Uhr mit der 2. Staffel zurück! Dann widmet sich Tierpsychologe Martin Rütter in 12 neuen Folgen wieder den kleinen und großen Problemen von Promi und Tier. Denn wenn der VOX-"Hundeprofi" den VIPs mit Rat und Tat unter die Arme greift, werden die Hunde ihre Star-Allüren los - oder umgekehrt. Martin lässt sich vom Glanz der Stars nicht blenden: Er erkennt schnell, auf welcher Seite der Leine das eigentliche Problem ist und sorgt für Zufriedenheit und Harmonie bei Vier- und Zweibeinern. In der 2. Staffel mit dabei: Moderatorin Nina Ruge, die Schauspieler Peer Kusmagk und Milos Vukovic, die Moderatorinnen Dunja Hayali, Sonja Zietlow und Miriam Pede, Sänger Oli P., Fußballspieler Toni Polster, Model Jana Ina Zarrella, Moderator Uwe Hübner, "No Angels"-Sängerin Sandy Mölling und Ex-Eiskunstläuferin Tanja Szewczenko.
In der ersten Folge hat es Martin Rütter gleich mit zwei ganz unterschiedlichen Fällen zu tun: Sänger Oli Petszokat kämpft bei seinen zwei Hunden mit Futterneid und stundenlangem Schlecken, Nina Ruge sucht Unterstützung bei einem großen Schritt: Sie will sich einen zweiten Hund anschaffen.
Chaotische Zustände und Ärger im Doppelpack erwarten den "V.I.P. Hundeprofi" bei Sänger Oliver Petszokat. Die französische Bulldogge "Pontus" und Labrador-Mix "Phoebe" haben ihre ganz eigenen Macken: "Pontus" bettelt bei jeder Gelegenheit und gönnt "Phoebe" nicht das kleinste Leckerchen. Wenn "Phoebe" hingegen mit dem Schlecken angefangen hat, hört sie von alleine nicht mehr auf. "Sie denkt, ihre Aufgabe auf dieser Welt ist es, mich abzuschlecken", erklärt der Sänger. Tierpsychologe Martin Rütter hat das Spiel jedoch schnell durchschaut: "Das nennt sich soziales Komfortverhalten. Das ist nicht weiter schlimm, in maximal zehn Tagen haben wir das im Griff", so Rütter. Problematischer wird es bei der bettelnden "Pontus", die einfach alles haben will, sobald es jemand anderes bekommt. Hier sieht der "V.I.P. Hundeprofi" die Schwierigkeit mehr bei Herrchen Oliver: "Du bist ein absoluter Hunde-verrückt-Macher. Das, was du mit den Hunden machst, führt bei sensiblen Tieren zu einem Worst-Case-Szenario." Harte Worte für den Sänger. Zu allem Überfluss muss Oli P. nicht nur mit Martins Ratschlägen und Kritik klarkommen: Genüsslich, amüsiert und gerne auch mit einem Schuss Häme kommentieren sich die teilnehmenden Promis gegenseitig auf dem Weg zur perfekten Harmonie. Ob Martin Rütter aus Oliver Petszokat ein richtiges Herrchen machen kann?
Szenenwechsel: Nina Ruge hat sich entschieden: Ein neuer Hund soll neben Entlebucher Sennenhund "Lupo" an ihre Seite. Martin Rütter: "Nina und ich hatten schon in der 1. Staffel richtig Arbeit mit 'Lupo'. Ich hoffe, sie weiß, dass es mit einem zweiten Hund natürlich noch anstrengender wird!" Gemeinsam geht es für die beiden nach Italien, um bei einer ortsansässigen Schweizer-Sennenhund-Züchterin den passenden Welpen und Spielgefährten für "Lupo" auszusuchen. Eine Hündin soll es sein, so viel steht fest. Doch welchen Charakter hat das Tier? Und welcher Hund passt zu "Lupo" und Nina? Hier weiß Martin Rütter Rat: Bevor die Moderatorin einen Welpen mitnehmen kann, muss ein Vertrauenstest her: Nina soll einfach nur einen Welpen auf den Rücken drehen und trotz Gegenwehr festhalten. Doch da wird gestrampelt, gefiept und gemotzt, was das Zeug hält. Der "Hundeprofi" ist begeistert: "Das Hundetrainerherz schlägt höher bei der Welpenauswahl, das ist sehr sehr niedlich." Die kleine "Simba" soll es am Ende des Tages werden: "Das ist sie! Guck' mal, Martin, die ist doch total nett!", freut sich Nina. Wird sich "Simba" in ihrem neuen Zuhause wohl fühlen? Wie wird Energiebündel "Lupo" auf den neuen Spielgefährten reagieren und ist Nina Ruge für die neue Herausforderung gewappnet?
"Der V.I.P. Hundeprofi" mit Nina Ruge, Peer Kusmagk, Milos Vukovic, Dunja Hayali, Sonja Zietlow, Miriam Pede, Oli P., Toni Polster, Jana Ina Zarrella, Uwe Hübner, Sandy Mölling und Tanja Szewczenko ab Samstag, 15. Januar 2011 um 19:10 Uhr bei VOX.
Weitere Informationen finden Sie in der Pressemappe zur Sendung "Der V.I.P. Hundeprofi" im VOX-Pressezentrum unter http://kommunikation.vox.de.
Originaltext: VOX Television GmbH Digitale Pressemappe: http://www.presseportal.de/pm/6952 Pressemappe via RSS : http://www.presseportal.de/rss/pm_6952.rss2
Pressekontakt: Bei Rückfragen: VOX Kommunikation und Presse, Katrin Kraft, Tel.: 0221/456-81506 Bei Fotowünschen: VOX Bildredaktion, Lotte Lilholt, Tel.: 0221/456-81512

description.hltext_display: Volvo PV väntas få statlig julklapp
description.content:
Ekonomi Göteborg
Volvo Personvagnar ser ut att få klart med sitt eftertraktade lån från Europeiska investeringsbanken (EIB) före nyår. Regeringen väntas fatta beslut om de nödvändiga statliga garantierna på dagens sammanträde, erfar TT. Näringsminister Maud Olofsson (C) håller pressträff på förmiddagen med anledning av beslutet. EIB har beviljat Volvo 600 miljoner euro, cirka 5,5 miljarder kronor, i lån och EU-kommissionen har godkänt upplägget med statsgaranti. TTPublicerad2010-12-22 08:59

description.hltext_display: De kan bli årets idrottare
description.content:
I dag kom beskedet. Viking Line har tecknat skeppsbyggnadskontrakt med STX.
Här är pressmeddelandet ord för ord:
Skeppsbyggnadskontraktet mellan Viking Line Abp och STX Finland Oy har i dag trätt i kraft. Ikraftträdandet skedde sedan båda parter kommit överens om de avtalade kontraktsförbehållen. Ett av förbehållen gällde det miljöinvesteringsstöd om vilket kommunikationsministeriet beslutat igår. Utbetalningen av stödet förutsätter att EU-kommissionen godkänner stödprogrammet samt Viking Lines stödansökan. Parterna fullföljer därmed det intentionsavtal som undertecknades den 25 oktober 2010. Investeringen uppgår till ca 240 MEUR. Avtalet innehåller en option på ytterligare ett fartyg.
Fartyget kommer att byggas på Åbovarvet för trafik på linjen Åbo - Åland - Stockholm med beräknad leverans i början av 2013. Fartygets längd är ca 214 meter och har en bruttodräktighet på ca 57.000 ton. Isklassen är 1 A Super. Fartyget är planerat för 2800 resenärer och kommer att ha en besättning på 200 personer. Passagerarhytternas antal i detta innovativa och moderna fartyg är 880. Fraktfilernas längd är 1275 meter och för personbilarna finns det reserverat 500 meter på ett separat bildäck. Dessutom finns det tilläggsutrymme för personbilar på bilhyllor som kan sänkas ner.
Fartyget representerar en helt ny fartygsgeneration och i planeringsarbetet har stor vikt lagts vid miljövänliga lösningar, hög passagerarkomfort samt nya upplevelser för passagerarna. Viking Line hoppas att med denna nya satsning även i fortsättningen kunna erbjuda sina kunder trevliga reseupplevelser.
"Vi är mycket tacksamma för det stöd projektet fått från många olika håll och är speciellt glada över att vi så här inför julen kan bidra till flera tusen arbetstillfällen i Åboregionen", säger Viking Lines vd Mikael Backman. Det nya fartygsbygget innebär för varvet ca 2.600 årsarbetsplatser. Mikael Backman Verkställande direktör

description.hltext_display: Morales con reservas de Pitino
description.content:
SAN JUAN, PR -- Puerto Rico tiene un nuevo entrenador de su selección de baloncesto para el 2011, pero las razones para ello no tienen nada que ver nada con la nacionalidad del técnico.
Eso se dejó claro en la Isla del Encanto cuando los directivos de esta disciplina en el país dieron sus explicaciones para justificar la contratación del cotizado mentor universitario Rick Pitino para las próximas competencias internacionales.
Pero algunos no están completamente de acuerdo con que el entrenador de la Universidad de Louisville en la NCAA, quien ha trabajado con otras instituciones de esta organización, así como en la NBA con las franquicias de los New York Knicks y los Boston Celtics, sea el candidato idóneo para tomar las riendas del quinteto nacional boricua. La razón que aducen es que el técnico de raíces italianas no tiene experiencia con el baloncesto internacional.
Uno de esos es el analista Carlos A. Morales, quien después de pilotar la escuadra puertorriqueña en varios torneos internacionales en la década de los noventa, y quien ahora labora para ESPN Deportes como comentarista, tiene sus reservas de la forma en que se produjo la selección del nuevo mentor de PR de cara al torneo preolímpico en agosto del 2011 en Argentina, en el cual se definirán solo dos espacios para las Olimpiadas del 2012 en Londres. La otra plaza del continente americano la ocupa Estados Unidos por ser el campeón de la pasada competencia en Pekín 2008,
"Aparentemente lo que había era una tendencia previa y una inclinación de traer un 'coach' extranjero", destacó Morales, quien guió a los boricuas a una medalla de Oro en los Juegos de la Buena Voluntad de 1994 celebrados en Rusia. "Lo que sí me sorprende, no porque Pitino no tenga los meritos, es que eso no era lo que se había hablado".
A lo que Morales se refería es que antes del nombramiento de Pitino a la posición, en todo momento la Federación de Baloncesto de Puerto Rico que preside el Lcdo. Carlos J. Beltrán hablaba de la posibilidad de buscar una persona con experiencia en el sistema internacional.
"Se habló de un extranjero para amoldarnos al sistema de juego FIBA y que nos habíamos quedado atrás en el juego europeo. Que jugamos el juego de la NBA y a lo americano, cosa que coincido, y que ya estaba probado que los jugadores tenían el mismo talento de los de Estados Unidos", explicó.
"Sin embargo, los vientos apuntaban a que fuera un coach que dominara el juego FIBA. Rick Pitino, que es un gran coach, no domina el juego FIBA", dijo Morales sobre el estilo de juego con marcadas diferencias al de Estados Unidos que se juega con las llamadas 'reglas americanas'. "Va a tener problemas, pero como todo buen coach tendrá que realizar unos periodos de ajustes, el cual va a depender grandemente de sus asistentes y sus escuchas que lo pongan al día como se juega el baloncesto internacional", planteó, al tiempo que dijo lo interesante que será para los jugadores, y cómo se sentirán nuevamente, el jugar bajo el mandato de un técnico anglosajón.
Morales hizo una comparación de los otros candidatos mencionados, el argentino Sergio Hernández y el español Moncho Monsalve, que fuera el piloto de Brasil en las recientes competencias. Y el boricua entiende que Pitino es superior a Monsalve, no así sobre el gaucho que tuvo gran éxito al frente del combinado suramericano, pero que fue dejado fuera de la dirección de su país para el nuevo ciclo olímpico.
“
Entiendo la moda, de que quieren un extranjero. Pero lo importante no es que sea criollo o extranjero, es que el coach sea bueno de verdad. No me parece que Pitino sea un mal coach, ya que es excelente, pero pudimos haber aspirado a más, ya que podían haber reclutado a uno con buen nombre, pero que también tuviera experiencia internacional.
” -- Carlos Morales
"Con Sergio Hernández es diferente, ya que Pitino ha tenido los mismos éxitos en los Estados Unidos. Pero Hernández tiene una leve ventaja por su experiencia en la FIBA. Aun así yo pensaba que se iban a decidir por un coach extranjero, que fuera bueno de verdad y que no vendrían con inventos", apuntó Morales, a la misma vez que dejó claro que no tiene problemas que un dirigente del exterior asuma la dirección del combinado boricua.
El comentarista televisivo considera que en Puerto Rico hay técnicos tan buenos como en el extranjero, y puso como ejemplo el nombre de Flor Meléndez, quien ha dirigido por más de dos décadas en el baloncesto profesional de Argentina, Venezuela y algunas ligas de Europa. Además el también ex piloto nacional, que ganó medalla de Plata en los Panamericanos de 1979 celebrados en San Juan, es el segundo dirigente con más victorias en el torneo superior de Puerto Rico, superado por Julio Toro, otro ex dirigente del seleccionado nacional de este país.
"Entiendo la moda, de que quieren un extranjero. Pero lo importante no es que sea criollo o extranjero, es que el coach sea bueno de verdad. No me parece que Pitino sea un mal coach, ya que es excelente, pero pudimos haber aspirado a más, ya que podían haber reclutado a uno con buen nombre, pero que también tuviera experiencia internacional", enfatizó Morales, quien de paso aclaró que nunca fue contactado para ver su disponibilidad para regresar al puesto por segunda ocasión en su carrera.
"Lo importante es que Puerto Rico tenga un buen coach. Y que haga un buen trabajo, independiente de que sea extranjero o local. Que sea lo suficientemente bueno que toda esta algarabía del nuevo coach se justifique", finiquitó.

description.hltext_display: Small Business Loans – Cash Help For Small Enterprises
description.content: Cash is a very important part of the operating cycle of any business. It is required in every aspect of business. From the purchase of raw materials to the final sale of finished goods, it is required everywhere. So, the time when we face cash deficiency, we need an immediate way out. This may be in the form of small business loans.Small business loans are small cash advances which are offered without any hassle. The loan amount is generally dependent upon the business you are running. Some businesses are seasonal so require more cash in comparison to others. These businesses are more dependent upon the credit help from outside. The loan period also varies from 1000 pounds to 25000 pounds. It may go beyond this level too. These loans have certain conditions that every person has to meet if he or she wants to have loan. Presently these loans are offered only to the people living in UK. They should have attained an age of 18 years before applying. They should also have a valid bank account in the name of business. It is this bank account which will be used to credit the loan amount once it is approved. These loans are mostly offered in unsecured way. It means that the borrower need not worry about keeping any of his or her assets with the lender to get the loan approved. But this type of loan also has a demerit. These are offered at slightly higher rate of interest. To avoid such situations you can go for secured loans. These loans are very helpful for any business that is facing some cash insufficiency. These may also be obtained online and this feature makes them very easy to approve loans.

description.hltext_display: 冯潇霆引爆国足中卫危机 此时不招李玮锋等待何时?
description.content:
大江网・体育频道2010-12-22 13:47
新浪体育讯 随着亚洲杯的日益临近，正抓紧备战最后一场与马其顿热身赛的国足最终名单也呼之欲出。22日凌晨某地方报率先曝料一直未与国足会合的主力中卫冯潇霆因为身体情况将铁定无缘亚洲杯，这一消息随即又得到足协某官员的口头证实。尚且不论这其中究竟有什么内幕，一旦冯潇霆确定无缘亚洲杯的话，国足隐藏已久的中卫危机势必全面引爆。
自高洪波上任以来，在中后卫位置上考察的球员绝对是最少的。只要没有伤病，效力国内联赛的杜威、赵鹏、汪强是雷打不动的三大人选，如果比赛对手和级别够高，再召回在韩国效力的冯潇霆，这四个人也就是高洪波心中的最强中卫组合。其中首选杜威搭档冯潇霆，赵鹏是第一替补，汪强排名最后。
这四人之所以深得高洪波器重，与他们在某些比赛中表现出色不无关系，比如东亚四强赛中杜威与冯潇霆的搭档，中法之战汪强的多次舍身封堵等等，这些出彩瞬间无疑让高洪波逐步建立对他们的信任，自然而然也就将其他人选移出自己的计划。
然而一旦冯潇霆伤退成既定事实的话，高洪波的“A计划”无疑遭受重创，是沿用现有人员还是急招新人顶替的难题将摆在高洪波面前。在目前参加集训的队伍中，除杜威、赵鹏、汪强外，中卫位置上仅剩国奥小将李建滨一人，而他进队就是扮演一个陪练的角色，参加亚洲杯这种级别的大赛显然能力相差甚远，完全不在高洪波的考虑之中。主力右后卫张琳?倒是中卫出身，在俱乐部和国奥队也一直打中卫，但进国家队后就立刻被高洪波改造成边后卫，并牢牢占据主力的位置，在右后卫没有更好人选的前提下，高洪波肯定不会轻易让年轻的张琳?回到熟悉的中路。
用三个中卫征战亚洲杯这样的大赛显然过于单薄，但招新人又能招谁呢？除了杜威、赵鹏、汪强、冯潇霆之外，印象中高洪波上任以来从未用过其他中卫，像曾经的国家队常客张耀坤等与高家军彻底绝缘，反倒是连国安一队都未进过的雷腾龙、马冲冲这种国青小将完成过一次让人大跌眼镜的三级跳。
亚洲杯迫在眉睫，这个时候对于国家队和高洪波来说，在中后卫这么重要的位置上显然需要招来即用，委以重任的人，放眼整个中国足坛，能堪当此重任的也就唯有李玮锋一人。论能力和经验，李玮锋绝对还是目前中国足坛的第一中卫，虽然目前身陷转会旋涡，但仍然跟随水原三星进行冬训，身体状态绝对有保障，更重要的是李玮锋本人多次表达出重返国足参加亚洲杯的强烈愿望，如果能力、经验、决心都没有任何问题的话，国足在这个危机时刻又有什么理由拒绝他呢？此时不招等待何时？
对于高家军防线和李玮锋报国无门现象，中国足坛的一位超级大腕在与记者私下聊天时曾有过一段犀利而精辟的言论：“我要是国家队主教练，第一个就招李玮锋，理由很简单，现有其他人的水平跟他不在一个层次。国家队要的是竞技水平最高的球员，不是听话的球员。我从未听说谁公开质疑李玮锋的水平，那么只要他有为国效力的愿望，没有理由不招他。”
“中卫最重要的是防守能力，包括一对一能力和整体防守意识，这一点杜威、冯潇霆都不合格。杜威头球好没错，但他打不了中后卫，冯潇霆球风太软。至于汪强，我看不出他有什么能力，一个降级队的中后卫也值500万？”
高洪波早在上任之初就曾公开表示国家队的用人将不拘一格，球队大门向所有有实力的球员敞开。在日韩诸强纷纷召回包括本田圭佑、朴智星等大牌球星组成最强阵容参赛的情况下，早已沦为亚洲二三流的国足又有什么理由和资本拒绝自己仅剩不多的球星。

description.hltext_display: د. العثمان: أكبر مبلغ يُخصص لجامعة الملك سعود منذ تأسيسها قبل 54 عاما
description.content:
أكد الدكتور عبد الله العثمان مدير جامعة الملك سعود، أنه رغم الأزمات الاقتصادية التي هزت العالم، إلا أن المملكة ظلت بفضل الله، ثم بحكمة القيادة الرشيدة بمأمن من ذلك فلم تتأثر بشيء، بل تواصلت فيها جهود البناء والإصلاح وإطلاق المشاريع الكبيرة والتوسع فيها عاماً بعد عام.
ورفع العثمان، الشكر والتقدير باسمه وباسم منسوبي ومنسوبات الجامعة لخادم الحرمين الشريفين الملك عبد الله بن عبد العزيز، ولنائبه الأمير سلطان بن عبد العزيز ولي العهد، وللنائب الثاني الأمير نايف بن عبد العزيز، على ما خُصص لجامعة الملك سعود من الميزانية العامة للدولة هذا العام 1432/1433. وتابع “تتجلى في كل ميزانية تعلنها الدولة مدى عناية خادم الحرمين الشريفين ببناء الدولة والإنسان، حيث تركَّزت ميزانية هذا العام ـ التي تُعد الأضخم في تاريخ البلاد ـ على البعد الإنساني والبعد التنموي عبر التوسع الكمي والنوعي في أهم الخدمات التي يحتاج إليها المواطن كالتعليم والرعاية الصحية اللذين يُعدان محورين في سياسة الإصلاح التي انتهجتها حكومة البلاد منذ سنوات، إضافة إلى تركيز الميزانية على إطلاق المشاريع التي تعزز استمرار النمو والتنمية، وتتيح المزيد من الفرص الوظيفية للمواطنين، وليس أدل على ذلك من تخصيص 256 ملياراً لمشاريع جديدة وتوسعات في مشاريع سابقة لتحقيق رفاه المواطن، وتوفير حياة كريمة له في بيئة مثالية تتوافر فيها الخدمات كافة”.
ونبَّه العثمان إلى نقطة لافتة في إعلان الميزانية، قائلاً “بتأمل سجل الأرقام الواردة في إعلان الميزانية، يبرز البعد المعرفي ممثلاً في قطاع التعليم بوصفه الأهم بين القطاعات كافة، بدليل حجم المخصص له البالغ 137.6 مليار ريال الذي يمثل 24 في المائة من مجموع الميزانية، وهي النسبة الأكبر بين كل القطاعات، ولا شك أن هذه العناية تجسد وعي القيادة برسالة التعليم، وأنه الخيار الوحيد للنهضة بالوطن والمواطن، لكون الاستثمار في الإنسان هو أكثر أشكال الاستثمار أهمية، بل وربحية أيضاً، حيث يعد النجاح في بناء العقل البشري شرطاً لنجاح أي مشروع حضاري أو تنموي، إذ إن العقل هو المحرك لأي مشروع، وما لم يكن مؤسساً تأسيساً معرفياً متيناً فإنه ربما يفشل أو يتعثر في دفع حركة الحضارة”. وتابع “ولذا ورد ضمن المشاريع المعتمدة لهذا القطاع تهيئة المحاضن النموذجية لبناء العقل البشري بإنشاء آلاف المدارس الجديدة في قطاع التعليم العام وتزويدها بالأجهزة والمعامل اللازمة لنضج العملية التعليمية. وفي قطاع التعليم العالي فسيتواصل استكمال إنشاء المدن الجامعية ومستشفياتها ومساكن أعضاء هيئاتها التدريسية في عدد من المناطق، كما سيستمر نشاط برنامج خادم الحرمين الشريفين للابتعاث الخارجي”.
وأردف العثمان في هذا السياق “وبالنظر إلى حجم المبالغ المخصصة للجامعات نجد أن جامعة الملك سعود قد حظيت بالميزانية الأكبر، حيث خُصص لها مبلغ 7.843 مليار ريال وهو أكبر مبلغ يُخصص للجامعة منذ تأسيسها قبل أكثر من 54 عاماً، وأن ما خُصص للجامعة هو أمانة ومسؤولية تلزم ترجمتها بدقة إلى واقع مشاهد ينهض بالإنسان، ويتحول بالمجتمع إلى مجتمع معرفي يحتضن ثقافة المعرفة ويؤمن بدورها في تأسيس السمات الجديدة للوطن الحديث”. وأكد أن الجامعة تقرأ هاتين الرسالتين بوضوح وتتعهد بالالتزام في مواصلة استراتيجياتها التطويرية الهادفة إلى أن تكون جامعة رائدة على مستوى العالم، قادرة على صناعة تحولات في حركة التعليم تبرزه في صورة جديدة، وتجعله مؤثراً في سياقات النهضة بالوطن.

description.hltext_display: AFC West: Big wins leave Chargers wanting, needing more
description.content: (Sports Network) - They might have had the most impressive victory of Week 15, but as it turned out, the San Diego Chargers' 34-7 Thursday-night throttling of the San Francisco 49ers did the team precious little good by the time Sunday rolled around. Each of the teams that San Diego, now 8-6, is chasing to secure a spot in the upcoming AFC playoffs won in Week 15, leaving the Chargers in need of outside assistance if they're to continue a run of four consecutive AFC West division titles. San Diego trails the first-place Kansas City Chiefs by a game in the West and will head to Cincinnati (Dec. 26) and Denver (Jan. 2) for road tests to end the season. The Chiefs, meanwhile, are home to Tennessee and Oakland and can guarantee a divisional crown with two victories. If both teams end at 10-6, the Chargers win the tiebreaker based on would-be advantages in both divisional and conference records. If the teams wind up in a two-way tie at 9-7, San Diego also wins the tiebreaker with the same criteria. However, if there's a three-way tie with Oakland at 9-7, the Raiders win the division. In terms of a Wild Card berth, San Diego trails both the current placeholders -- the New York Jets and Baltimore -- by two games. One win apiece for the Jets and Ravens in their final two games would mathematically eliminate the Chargers from consideration. The Jets finish at Chicago and home with Buffalo, while the Ravens are at Cleveland and home with Cincinnati. At this point, New York looks likely to win a tiebreaker with San Diego based on strength of schedule, but the Chargers would beat Baltimore based on conference record if the Ravens end the season with consecutive losses. Pittsburgh is also 10-4 and could factor into the Wild Card if Baltimore wins the AFC North, but San Diego cannot pass the Steelers due to Pittsburgh's edge against common opponents. "No help [Sunday], obviously," San Diego quarterback Philip Rivers said. "We can only worry about ourselves. We must get to 10-6 and see if it is enough." The Chargers will not face colorful wide receiver Terrell Owens in the Week 16 matchup with the Bengals after he sustained a season-ending torn meniscus in his left knee during Cincinnati's 19-17 win over Cleveland last weekend. The 37-year-old Owens ends the year with 72 receptions for 983 yards and nine touchdowns. He fell 17 yards short of becoming the third receiver in league history to have 10 or more 1,000-yard seasons. Only two receivers aged 36 or over, Jerry Rice and Jimmy Smith, have reached the 1,000-yard mark in a season. Owens reached two of six incentives on a one-year contract, giving him $2.67 million for the season. BRONCOS: Welcome to the Tim Tebow Era, Part II. The former Heisman Trophy winner and two-time national champion at the University of Florida will make his second consecutive NFL start for the Denver Broncos this weekend against the Houston Texans, according to Eric Studesville, the team's interim head coach. The 25th overall selection in last April's draft -- a choice made by since- departed head coach Josh McDaniels -- Tebow completed 8-of-16 passes for 138 yards and a touchdown in his starting debut last Sunday in a 39-23 loss to the Oakland Raiders. He also rushed eight times for 78 yards and scored on a 40- yard run. Start No. 2 comes in front of the home fans at Invesco Field at Mile High, where the Broncos have not played since a Nov. 28 loss to the St. Louis Rams. Three subsequent road games ended in losses to Kansas City, Arizona and Oakland in which the team was outscored, 92-42. Studesville said the decision to start Tebow was compounded by the questionable health of incumbent Kyle Orton, who couldn't throw last week because of sore ribs and hasn't significantly improved since. "We just thought that prolonging this thing into the week was just not the best thing for our preparation in practice," Studesville said of Orton's injury. Denver had 33 total running plays and 16 passes against the Raiders last week, its fewest pass attempts this season. Orton's low was 29 attempts in the first game against Oakland in October, and he threw 40 or more passes five times. Studesville and offensive coordinator Mike McCoy went exclusively with running plays in the final minute of the first half against Oakland, and again when the Broncos were deep in their own territory. Houston enters the game with the league's worst pass defense, allowing 275.1 yards per week through the air. "A lot of things that go into those situations that put caution in the air, not the quarterback," Studesville said. "We're finding more and more out about what [Tebow] does. That game [Sunday] gave us a lot of information and a lot of things that we can work with and go from and build on as coaches to give him. "We've seen it out here [in practice], but it's different when everything is full speed on Sunday afternoon. And the things that he is good at, we're going to continue to do, and the things that he's not good at, just like any other player, we are not going to do those things." CHIEFS: Less than two weeks after surgery, Matt Cassel came to the rescue. The Kansas City Chiefs' quarterback returned to the field after a one-week absence and buoyed the AFC West leaders' playoff prospects in a 27-13 defeat of the St. Louis Rams at the Edward Jones Dome. Cassel had missed the previous week's game, a 31-0 loss to the second-place San Diego Chargers in Southern California, after undergoing an appendectomy four days earlier. "I felt 100 percent," he said. "Otherwise I wouldn't have been out there." The USC product completed 15-of-29 passes for 184 yards, a touchdown and an interception in his return, one week after understudy Brodie Croyle went just 7-for-17 for 40 yards against the Chargers. Croyle is 0-10 as an NFL starter. "{Cassel] was going to be throwing up blood or he was going to be playing football," Chiefs offensive lineman Brian Waters said. "That's the kind of guy he is." The Chiefs lead the Chargers by one game with two left on the 2010 schedule. Kansas City is home with Tennessee and Oakland. San Diego visits Cincinnati and Denver. "You've got to be a pro about it. You've got to take advantage of your situation," linebacker Derrick Johnson said. "We still control our destiny, meaning we should stay in our lane and worry about what we have to worry about and win the game we have to win. "We all know our situation regardless of win or lose by any other division opponent. If we win, we don't have to worry about that. There's not going to be any kind of Wild Card team coming out of our division. We need to win our division." If Kansas City and San Diego wind up dually tied at 10-6 or 9-7, the Chargers win a pair of tiebreakers based on what would be superior division or conference records. However, if there's a three-way tie with Oakland at 9-7, the Raiders win the division. San Diego has won the West four straight times. Kansas City's last division title came in 2003 under then-head coach Dick Vermeil. The Chiefs last made the playoffs in 2006 under Herman Edwards. "We're laying the foundation," Kansas City head coach Todd Haley said. "We're still in that process of trying to become a good team. The Kansas City Chiefs are not there, obviously, but we are going in the right direction and we're seeing some reward, which is some wins and reward for the hard work and sacrifice that the guys are putting in. "But we're making progress. That's the key for us, and that's been our goal, is to just get a little better every day -- every Wednesday, every Thursday, every Friday and then every Sunday -- and we've done that for the most part, and that's why I think we're sitting where we're sitting." RAIDERS: After 15 weeks, it's down to a four-step process for the Oakland Raiders. If each of four scenarios play out over the next two weekends, the Raiders become AFC West champions for the first time since 2002. But if they go anything less than 4-for-4, the playoff drought for the Silver and Black extends to eight seasons for the first time in franchise history. The four mandatory things in question include: Oakland beats visiting Indianapolis this Sunday. Oakland wins at Kansas City on Jan. 2. Kansas City loses to visiting Tennessee this Sunday. San Diego loses either at Cincinnati on Sunday or at Denver on Jan. 2. Completion of the four steps would put the Raiders in a three-way tie with Kansas City and San Diego or a two-way tie with the Chiefs atop the division, giving the Raiders the championship based on what would be a 6-0 record in the West. Oakland is just 2-7 in non-division games through 15 weeks. "It doesn't mean anything if we are at home watching Kansas City in the playoffs," defensive tackle Tommy Kelly said of the Raiders' success within the division. "It's something nice to say, but at the end of the day it doesn't mean anything. You don't even get a T-shirt." Only one other time in franchise history -- from its 1960 debut through the 1966 season -- has Oakland failed to reach the postseason for seven consecutive years. That drought ended with a 1967 AFL Championship and an appearance in Super Bowl II in January 1968. The current skid began after the Raiders were beaten, 48-21, by the Tampa Bay Buccaneers in Super Bowl XXXVII in January of 2003. In the seven subsequent seasons under five head coaches, Oakland went a combined 29-83, losing 11 or more games each year and bottoming out at 2-14 in 2006. The Raiders were 4-12 in Bill Callahan's final season in 2003 and just 9-23 in two seasons under current San Diego head coach Norv Turner from 2004-05. The aforementioned 2-14 came with Art Shell in 2006, and Oakland was 5-15 with upstart Lane Kiffin before he exited four games into 2008. The Raiders are 16-26 overall since Tom Cable succeeded Kiffin. "It's a lot more fun," Cable said of the team's improvement. "Football is football. I love football. I love coaching. That part of it is never an issue for me. It's just more exciting. You get up and come to work and you're excited about getting into a new plan."

description.hltext_display: Alpha Delta celebrates with Christmas social
description.content:
The Alpha Delta chapter of Epsilon Sigma Alpha gathered for their Christmas social, “Let Your Heart Give,” at the home of Linda Morris Dec. 16.
The members enjoyed a social time before the meal of taco soup, potato soup, relishes, cheese and crackers and numerous Christmas cookies and desserts.
Sharon Stevenson led the group in several games identifying Christmas songs. The members decided to donate to a charity rather than exchange gifts with each member talking about the charity of her choice. The rest of the evening was spent visiting.
Hostesses for the evening were Linda Morris and Sharon Stevenson. Members present were Ruth Archambeau, Joan Bair, Becky Bumgarner, Beth Glantz, Sue Gosselin, Georgia Larson, Diana Moore, Linda Morris, Sharon Stevenson and Charlotte Thiel.

description.hltext_display: Nyköpings största industriområde anläggs
description.content:
NCC bygger vägar, vatten och avlopp för nya företag och industrier i Nyköping.
På det cirka 40 hektar stora området intill E4:an bygger NCC Construction bland annat 1,7 kilometer väg. Det blir det största industriområdet i Nyköping när det är klart. Uppdragsgivare är Nyköpings kommun och ordern är värd 25,5 miljoner svenska kronor. Hemgården ligger i Nyköpings västra del. Området kommer att ligga väster om E4:an och består idag av fält och åkermark.

description.hltext_display: Bamburullstolar till japanskt flyg
description.content:
Japan Airlines (JAL) har kommit på ett sätt för rullstolsburna flygpassagerare att slippa tidsödande extrakontroller - rullstolar av bambu.
"Med en rullstol i bambu kan fysiskt utsatta passagerare färdas snabbt till gaten, de förblir sittande genom säkerhetskontrollen", heter det i ett pressmeddelande från JAL.
De sofistikerade fordonen går loss på 600 000 yen (50 000 kronor) styck, och införs på japanska flygplatser under 2011.

description.hltext_display: マルタイ工場移転 糸島市の用地は売却 酒見社長...
Major east China SM suppliers to double as big buyers in 2011
description.content:
SHANGHAI (ICIS)--East China-based styrene monomer (SM) producers will be competing for cargoes in the spot and contract markets more significantly next year, industry sources said on Wednesday.
Shanghai SECCO Petrochemical, Jiangsu Leasty Chemical, Dohow Chemical and Sinopec East China were planning to procure supply from the market, for varied reasons ranging from fulfilling the requirement of downstream plants, to the quest for better margins, company sources said.
Without a clear delineation of roles in the SM market, players were expecting confusion to ensue and would make it difficult for some to strategise their trading positions, industry sources said.
With these producers taking on the role of buyers as well, they would have a much stronger influence on prices, market sources said.
Among the four, Shanghai SECCO was facing SM shortage and would need to tap the market for cargoes to continue supplying to contract clients, a company source said.
Equipment problems at its 650,000 tonne/year SM unit in Shanghai would prevent the plant from optimising running rates for the most of next year. The unit was also due for a 40-day turnaround from September-October 2011, with production loss estimated at around 50,000 tonnes, the source added.
Shanghai SECCO would be procuring 3,000 tonnes of SM each month next year, said the source.
SM is a raw material used in manufacturing plastic resins like PS and ABS; and also synthetic rubbers like styrene butadiene rubber (SBR) and styrene butadiene latex (SBL).
In the case of Jiangsu Leasty Chemical, its own SM production could not cover the requirements of its downstream 240,000 tonne/year expanded polystyrene (EPS) plant, without cancelling term supply to clients, said a company source.
Its EPS plant started producing on-spec products in April 2010.
Jiangsu Leasty has two SM lines with a combined capacity of 400,000 tonnes/year in Jiangyin, Jiangsu province.
Next year, the company would be buying monthly volumes of 5,000-8,000 tonnes of SM, depending on the company’s EPS operations, said the company source.
Providing for downstream facilities was also the reason that Dohow’s intention to buy more spot cargoes - estimated at 3,000 tonnes/month - from the market next year, said one of its contract clients.
The company needed to supply feedstock to its 70,000 tonne/year acrylonitrile-butadiene-styrene (ABS) unit and its 315,000 tonne/year unsaturated polyester resins (UPR) unit, he said.
Dohow, a part of Yabang Group, has a 200,000 tonne/year SM unit at Changzhou in Jiangsu province.
For Sinopec East China – a big seller of cargoes from Ningbo Zhenhai Lyondell Chemical – meanwhile, buying term cargoes from major distributors in the east China market would be purely for trading purposes.
Sinopec East China had signed a term contract with a trading house for a monthly supply 3,000 tonnes of SM for a period of one year, said a company source.
Demand for SM in east China next year was estimated to increase by 9.3% to 8.18m tonnes, according to Chemease CBI China, a China energy market intelligence service.
ICIS is in the process of raising its stake in CBI China.
Read John Richardson and Malini Hariharan’s blog – Asian Chemical Connections
To discuss issues facing the chemical industry go to ICIS connect

description.hltext_display: Nu beställer Viking Line nytt fartyg
description.content:
I dag kom beskedet. Viking Line har tecknat skeppsbyggnadskontrakt med STX.
Här är pressmeddelandet ord för ord:
Skeppsbyggnadskontraktet mellan Viking Line Abp och STX Finland Oy har i dag trätt i kraft. Ikraftträdandet skedde sedan båda parter kommit överens om de avtalade kontraktsförbehållen. Ett av förbehållen gällde det miljöinvesteringsstöd om vilket kommunikationsministeriet beslutat igår. Utbetalningen av stödet förutsätter att EU-kommissionen godkänner stödprogrammet samt Viking Lines stödansökan. Parterna fullföljer därmed det intentionsavtal som undertecknades den 25 oktober 2010. Investeringen uppgår till ca 240 MEUR. Avtalet innehåller en option på ytterligare ett fartyg.
Fartyget kommer att byggas på Åbovarvet för trafik på linjen Åbo - Åland - Stockholm med beräknad leverans i början av 2013. Fartygets längd är ca 214 meter och har en bruttodräktighet på ca 57.000 ton. Isklassen är 1 A Super. Fartyget är planerat för 2800 resenärer och kommer att ha en besättning på 200 personer. Passagerarhytternas antal i detta innovativa och moderna fartyg är 880. Fraktfilernas längd är 1275 meter och för personbilarna finns det reserverat 500 meter på ett separat bildäck. Dessutom finns det tilläggsutrymme för personbilar på bilhyllor som kan sänkas ner.
Fartyget representerar en helt ny fartygsgeneration och i planeringsarbetet har stor vikt lagts vid miljövänliga lösningar, hög passagerarkomfort samt nya upplevelser för passagerarna. Viking Line hoppas att med denna nya satsning även i fortsättningen kunna erbjuda sina kunder trevliga reseupplevelser.
"Vi är mycket tacksamma för det stöd projektet fått från många olika håll och är speciellt glada över att vi så här inför julen kan bidra till flera tusen arbetstillfällen i Åboregionen", säger Viking Lines vd Mikael Backman. Det nya fartygsbygget innebär för varvet ca 2.600 årsarbetsplatser. Mikael Backman Verkställande direktör

description.hltext_display: Vinterkräksjukan i startgroparna
description.content:
På Kullbergska sjukhuset i Katrineholm är en hel avdelning stängd och både patienter och personal har däckat i magsjuka.
Här i norra länsdelarna är det fortfarande lugnt, med bara enstaka rapporterade fall på bland annat förskolor.
- Men det är på gång nu, och med alla julbord och allt resande riskerar läget förvärras snabbt den närmaste veckan, säger Carl-Gustaf Sundin och påminner om vikten av att tvätta händerna med såväl handsprit som två och vatten för att hålla det envisa viruset på avstånd.
ANNE-LIE ANDERSSON

description.hltext_display: آل الشيخ: هدفنا الأسمى تحقيق توجيهات القيادة الرشيدة
description.content:
أشار الدكتور حمد آل الشيخ وكيل جامعة الملك سعود للتطوير والجودة، إلى ميزانية الدولة للعام المالي (1431-1432هـ) للتعليم والتدريب بالحجم الهائل الذي ظهرت به بالدليل القوي على مواصلة برامج التنمية والتطوير للموارد البشرية في المملكة، والاهتمام الذي توليه حكومة خادم الحرمين الشريفين للإنسان وتنميته وصحته وتعليمه وتأهيله. حيث حاز هذا القطاع المهم 28 في المائة من إجمالي الميزانية التقديرية.
وحول المخصصات المالية لجامعة الملك سعود التي بلغت قيمتها 7.843 مليار ريال، يضيف آل الشيخ “إن صدور ميزانية الدولة للعام الجديد متضمنةً هذه المخصصات المالية للجامعة، تستند إلى قوة ومتانة البرامج التطويرية في هذه الجامعة، وتشير بقوة إلى التوجه نحو الأهمية التي توليها الدولة للاستثمار المعرفي كأحد الأهداف القائمة للجامعة التي تسعى لتعزيز متانة الاقتصاد الوطني استناداً إلى البحوث العلمية ذات الجدوى الاستثماري، وإن بلوغ ما تم تخصيصه لقطاع التعليم العام والتعليم العالي وتدريب القوى العاملة بقيمة 150 مليار ريال وبزيادة بلغت نسبتها 8 في المائة عما تم تخصيصه بميزانية العام المالي الحالي؛ لمؤشر قوي على حرص القيادة الرشيدة على توفير البيئة المناسبة للتعليم وزيادة الطاقة الاستيعابية للمدارس والجامعات والكليات المتخصصة؛ حقاً إنها ميزانية الخير وإنها لفخرٌ لنا جميعاً”. وحول النتائج الملموسة للميزانية التي بثت البشرى للمواطنين، قال “إن نتائجها الملموسة تشير إلى طموح الدولة الكبير إلى إنجاز العديد من المشاريع الاستراتيجية والتنموية، فكان من أهم ما يميز ميزانية الخير أن خطط الاستثمار في التعليم العالي على وجه العموم حظيت بنصيبٍ قوي من الصرفِ الحكومي، فمن المعروف لدى الجميع أن الجامعات السعودية لديها الكثير من المشاريع الاستراتيجية التي أصبح يُشار إليها بالبنان، فأصبح الهدف الأسمى بالنسبة لها تحقيق توجيهات خادم الحرمين الشريفين الملك عبد الله بن عبد العزيز، وولي عهده الأمين الأمير سلطان بن عبد العزيز، والنائب الثاني الأمير نايف بن عبد العزيز”.

description.hltext_display: Nueva Zelanda desclasifica informes militares sobre ovnis y extraterrestres
description.content:
Sídney (Australia), 22 dic (EFE).- El Ejército de Nueva Zelanda desclasificó hoy cientos de informes militares hasta ahora secretos sobre presuntos avistamientos de ovnis y encuentros con alienígenas, informó la radio nacional.
Más de 2.000 páginas de datos incluyen testimonios de civiles, militares y pilotos comerciales que afirmaron haber visto en el cielo objetos voladores no identificados, aunque casi todos fueron simples efectos de los movimientos de la luz.
Los informes contienen dibujos de platillos volantes, detalladas descripciones de extraterrestres que portaban máscaras similares a las de los faraones egipcios y textos supuestamente escritos por marcianos.
Un caso concreto relata un avistamiento en 1978 de luces extrañas a bordo de un avión comercial cerca de la población de Kaikoura en la Isla Sur.
De acuerdo a los documentos desclasificados, uno de los pasajeros era un reportero de televisión que grabó imágenes del fenómeno, que suscitó un enorme interés hasta que la Fuerza Aérea lo investigó y concluyó que se trataba de un reflejo poco común del planeta Venus.
Los papeles, elaborados entre 1954 y 2009, fueron publicados bajo la ley de libertad de información de Nueva Zelanda y todos los nombres fueron suprimidos para proteger la identidad de las personas implicadas.
El Ejército neozelandés no comentará los datos. EFE

description.hltext_display: 国安高层南下与两国脚谈判 球员表态当替补免谈
description.content:
大江网・体育频道2010-12-22 13:47
网易体育12月22日报道：
现在看来，外教帕切科执教国安的问题已经基本解决，接下来国安就要投入到球员签约工作中去。据《体坛周报》报道，国安准备和即将到期的五名球员续约合同，但有球员明确表示：如果以“主力替补”这一档签约，免谈！
上赛季结束后，就有不少球队盯上了国安即将到期的5名球员，现在确定了球队主帅，是时候和他们签订新的合同了。毕竟这五人对国安来说非常重要，除了球场上对球队的贡献之外，徐云龙、黄博文、杨昊、杜文辉和王长庆都有固定的球迷助威团，一旦放走了他们，对国安的球票销售也是一个不小的损失。
徐云龙、黄博文、杨昊都是球队的主力，而杜文辉和王长庆虽然不是主力，但在替补登场后的作用也是非常明显，所以对国安来说，这几个人一个也不能少。但要想留住他们也不是容易的事情，对于这几个球员来说，第一就是看看他们能否适应新帅的风格，这样才可以确定是否在球队中占据一席之地，另外就是俱乐部能否提高他们的待遇。
就目前的情况来看，这两点确实让球员很为难，毕竟主帅还没有签约，球员们根本不知道下赛季的风格如何。另外国安球员的待遇历来在中超球队中不是很高，像杨昊这样的国家队主力球员，年收入也不过是几十万元，这和恒大以及鲁能等球队主力有不小的差距。
在国安和球员们进行沟通时，有球员直接表示：“待遇必须有个档次问题，别的都不说，在球队这么多年了，如果还是用“主力替补”这一档跟我签约，那就肯定没得谈了！”对于球员们的这一要求，国安高层表示会最大限度的保护好双方的利益，无论是球员薪水还是其他利益上都会有变动。而俱乐部高层还将赶赴广东和黄博文以及杨昊进行商谈，以求尽快敲定合同。
(本文来源：网易体育 作者：浪迹天涯)

description.hltext_display: Nicklas tog hem Kuriren-Klockan
description.content:
Solvallalärlingen är son till den kände travprofilen Robert Bergh. För sin bedrift fick Niclas utöver en fin klocka också ett resepresentkort på 10 000 kronor.
– Med tanke på rådande kyla vore det skönt att åka iväg till något varmt land, huttrar Westerholm.
Kuriren-Klockan har avgjorts ända redan 1968.

description.hltext_display: Cowboys to place Romo on IR
description.content: Arlington, TX (Sports Network) - The Dallas Cowboys are set to officially end the season of quarterback Tony Romo, and will place the starter on injured reserve. The team's website reported on Tuesday afternoon that the move was imminent. Romo hasn't taken a snap since October 25, when he suffered a fractured left collarbone in a 41-35 loss to the New York Giants. In six games this season, the Eastern Illinois product threw for 1,605 yards, 11 touchdowns and seven interceptions on 148-of-213 completions.

description.hltext_display: REFILE-News Corp wins EU approval to buy remaind ...
description.content:
BRUSSELS, Dec 21 (Reuters) - Rupert Murdoch's News Corp won unconditional European Union regulatory approval on
Tuesday for its bid to acquire pay-TV operator BSkyB.
News Corp, which also owns British newspapers the Sun, the
News of the World and the Times and Sunday Times, wants to buy
the 61 percent of BSkyB it does not already own for 7.8 billion
pounds ($12.19 billion) to consolidate the business it helped
build.
'I am confident that this merger will not weaken competition
in the United Kingdom. The effects on media plurality are a
matter for the UK authorities,' EU Competition Commissioner
Joaquin Almunia said in a statement.
Britain's communications regulator Ofcom is now examining
the deal to see if it would give News Corp too much control of
the media in the United Kingdom. Keywords: SKY NEWSCORP/EU

description.hltext_display: Power consumers stress need to liberalise sector
description.content:
Power users have called on the government to overhaul the Tanzania Electric Supply Company (Tanesco) and liberalise the entire power sector to protect them from occasional price hikes and other malaises of the firm.
Interviewed Tanesco customers in Dar es Salaam and upcountry said yesterday that they did not see the logic of Energy and Water Utilities Regulatory Authority (Ewura) allowing the state power firm to increase power tariff while its services were still poor.
They said the country’s power utility had not reached the professional standards of providing its services, adding that the firm was facing so many problems making it difficult to supply power reliably.
In the circumstances, it was wrong for Ewura to allow it to increase the power tariff with no any positive result,” said Gladness Sheshangali a resident of Morogoro.
On Monday, Ewura approved Tanesco’s proposal to increase power tariff by 18.5 per cent. The power firm had asked the regulatory authority to approve an increase of 34.6 per cent.
Its Director General, Haruna Masebu, said the new tariff would take effect next month and the adjustment thereof, would only be for next year instead of three years as requested by the power firm.
Sheshangali said that the power tariff increment coupled with the ongoing shedding would make the low income earners to continue to be poor.
Avitus Kyoma, who owns a stationery in Morogoro Municipality, said he was surprised when he learnt of the power increase while the present tariff were still high.
“There is a need to liberalise the power sector so many companies can compete and give power users a wide range of choices,” Kyoma said.
Barnabas Isaya, an entrepreneur based in Arusha, said he did not expect that Ewura would have approved the power tariff increment proposal by Tanesco while the country was experiencing unending power shedding.
“This increment will force the businesspersons to increase the charges for the services we offer and this would also have an impact on the low income earners as well,” he said.
He said that although Tanesco had set plans to connect power to rural area dwellers by 2015 he wondered how they would meet the charges the town dwellers were failing to pay.
For his part, Hassan Kuambiana, who resides at Kijitonyama in Dar es Salaam, said the tariff increment will have direct impact to the low income earners in that it will increase their costs of living.
“Even if the increment is only five shillings it do affects much, because power touches almost every angle of human life, since the power also run industries” said Kuambiana.
Echoing Sheshangali’s views, Mohamed Rashid, who resides at Ubungo, also in Dar es Salaam said it was high time the government allowed other companies to invest in the power sector.
Interviewed residents in Iringa Region said the increment in power tariffs was a government trick to use the money collected to pay Dowans, the power firm which took over the controversial Richmond LLC stakes in emergence power generation deal.
Dowans demands USD169bn from the government after it won an International Criminal Court arbitration last month.
Gerson Simon said that the 40 MW shortage in the national grid was due to Tanesco’s failure to conduct frequent research and give reports on how to overcome the problem.
Mchikichini ward councillor Riami Gharibu said any change in power supply would affect the public since some of the economic activities like markets, catering, factory work and even construction, leave aside the social ones, would always be the victims.
“It is amazing to see that the government is campaigning against deforestation while the option is now unaffordable. Yet it was recently reported that the price of gas has gone up,” he explained, alerting the government that the increase in electricity costs would lead to more trees cutting.
Special Seat Councillor Mwanaisha Mwita said Ewura should have first solved the problem of power rationing before increasing power tariff.
“They have not solved the first problem but they are busy announcing the increase in power tariff, I am disappointed with the plan,” she said.

description.hltext_display: 卯の大絵馬登場 ＪＲ二日市駅 九産高生制作
NFC South: Falcons set for immense showdown
description.content: (Sports Network) - The Georgia Dome has been more like a Terrordome for visiting opponents with Atlanta Falcons quarterback Matt Ryan at the helm. Ryan is an amazing 19-1 in his career at home, where the Falcons are 6-0 this season, and is preparing for the biggest game of the season Monday versus the division-rival and defending Super Bowl champion New Orleans Saints. Ryan helped the Falcons complete a perfect three-game road trip with Sunday's 34-18 victory at Seattle and post their eighth win in row overall. The former first-round draft pick posted his fourth three-touchdown game of the season by completing 20 of his 35 pass attempts for 174 yards with an interception. Ryan, the NFC Offensive Player of the Month for November, has thrown for a career-high 25 touchdowns this season and has a TD pass in a career-best 13 straight games. He has thrown multiple touchdown passes in eight games in 2010 and owns 32 wins in his first three seasons. Hall of Famer Dan Marino had 33 wins in his first three campaigns. "That's a great quarterback to be compared to in terms of being a winning quarterback," said Falcons head coach Mike Smith. "Matt has worked very hard and we've got a good group around him. Matt understands the framework of what we want to try to do as a football team. He is a team player. He is the leader of our football team. I can't say enough about how he's performed since he's been here." Atlanta was able to clinch a postseason berth for the second time in three years after Philadelphia stormed back to defeat the New York Giants earlier on Sunday. All the Falcons need to do now is defeat the visiting Saints Monday night to secure the first NFC South title since 2004, a first-round bye and home-field advantage in the NFC playoffs. Atlanta just proved it can win on the road, but obviously enjoys the cozy confines of the Georgia Dome. With an NFC-best 12-2 record, the Falcons have been putting together wins in all three phases of the game. Twelve wins in the first 14 games is tied with the 1998 team for the best 14-game record in franchise history. The defense doesn't get the attention it deserves in the media, but certainly opposing teams are aware of what Atlanta does when Ryan and Company are not on the field. Sack master and veteran defensive end John Abraham notched his 12th QB takedown of the season with one on Sunday and owns four in his last four games. The Falcons have posted two or more sacks in eight games this season and have totaled 27 on the year. Nine of Atlanta's 27 sacks this season have come in the fourth quarter. The only way to take Saints quarterback Drew Brees out of the equation is by sending last year's Super Bowl MVP to the turf early and often. In a 27-24 overtime win at New Orleans back on Sep. 26, Abraham had one of the two sacks on the day, while Thomas DeCould and Brent Grimes registered interceptions. Atlanta will wrap up the regular season versus Carolina on Jan. 2. SAINTS: The New Orleans Saints benefited from playing in the Louisiana Superdome on their way to an NFL title a season ago. Now it appears the Saints will have to deal with not playing in the Big Easy because they're no longer the big bullies on the block. They are still an impressive 10-4 this season and are on the verge of clinching a playoff berth, but have a few obstacles in getting back to the postseason. New Orleans can punch its ticket to the postseason with a win Sunday in Atlanta or with a loss or tie by both Green Bay and Tampa Bay. It can even win the NFC South for a second consecutive year and earn a first-round bye and home-field advantage with two more wins and an Atlanta loss versus Carolina in Week 17. That's not likely going to happen, so settling on a playoff berth will be more than suffice for the Saints. Before postseason talks occur, the Saints must learn how to run the football and stop the run -- something they did not do in Sunday's 30-24 loss at Baltimore. New Orleans ran for a season-low 27 yards and allowed 208 yards on the ground -- 153 alone to Ravens running back Ray Rice. "We're doing the same thing we've been doing," said Saints head coach Sean Payton, whose team nearly rallied from a 21-7 deficit to extend a six-game winning streak. "Obviously they rushed the ball pretty well today. so we'll look to clean some of that up. He's (Rice) a good back, he's a real good back and he ran well today." Payton has to start cleaning up the mess now with Falcons running back Michael Turner on the horizon. Turner has reached the 100-yard rushing mark seven times this season and pounded New Orleans for 114 yards and a score on 30 carries in the first meeting back in September. The Saints fell to 5-2 as the guest and will put their 8-2 conference record on the line in Atlanta. Running backs Pierre Thomas, Reggie Bush and Julius Jones were not even a factor against Baltimore's aging stop unit and are set to face the Falcons' 12th-rated run defense. Bush was pretty much a waste with minus-four yards on four carries, while Thomas led the weak ground attack with 20 yards on six touches. New Orleans will close out the regular season at home versus Tampa Bay. BUCCANEERS: The 7-3 start for the Tampa Bay Buccaneers has vanished with three losses over the past four games. Their playoff chances are not too far off. Tampa Bay put its postseason hopes in jeopardy with a disheartening loss versus the Detroit Lions on Sunday in front of the home crowd, as Lions kicker Dave Rayner split the uprights from 34 yards away minutes into overtime. Josh Freeman, known for his fourth-quarter magic, came up short in his attempt to put the Bucs ahead for good and gave the Lions a chance to tie the game on Rayner's 28-yard boot as time expired in regulation. Freeman passed for 251 yards and a touchdown, and has thrown a TD pass in all but one game this season. He's also been intercepted only once in the previous six weeks, but those heroics have Tampa's playoff hopes hanging by a thread. "It's certainly a gut punch but not a death blow," Bucs head coach Raheem Morris said after his team racked up 403 yards. "We've got to find a way to get back out there. We have to put this game behind us and go on to the next game. Next Sunday can't get here fast enough." What's more depressing for Tampa Bay is that the Lions were able to end an NFL-worst 26-game road losing streak and win for the first time as the visitor since the 2007 campaign. The Bucs also lost to a third-string QB in Drew Stanton, who completed 23-of-37 passes for 252 yards and a touchdown. It's been well publicized that the Bucs are down a few men due to injury, including cover corner Aqib Talib. Calvin Johnson had 152 yards on 10 catches against Tampa Bay's defensive backfield, which is now led by veteran CB Ronde Barber. The Bucs are back at home Sunday versus the Seattle Seahawks and another loss would eliminate them from the playoff picture. They are trying to catch both the Giants and Saints for the final wild card berth, while a loss this week to Seattle or wins by New York and New Orleans would seal Tampa's fate. Rookie running back LeGarrette Blount will be key in winning 10 games this season and has hit the century mark in rushing twice in the past three weeks. He had 110 yards and a score on only 15 carries against the Lions, averaging a career-high 7.3 yards per run. Blount moved past Saints rookie Chris Ivory for rushing yards among first-year players with 777. He's also tied with Colts rookie running back Javarris James with six rushing scores. Bucs rookie wideout Mike Williams leads all first-year players in receptions (58), receiving yards (880) and receiving touchdowns (8), and has been Freeman's favorite target all season. That won't stop Sunday versus Seattle. PANTHERS: The Carolina Panthers may have spoiled their chances for getting the top pick in next April's NFL Draft by winning Sunday versus Arizona. At 2-12 on the season, the Panthers are still in the running for possibly the best quarterback in the draft, but both Cincinnati and Denver sport identical 3-11 records. Detroit isn't too far off with a 4-10 ledger. The Panthers were preparing for next season by Halloween and rookie quarterback Jimmy Clausen was testing his mettle at the NFL level. It took the third to last game of the season for the former Notre Dame star to earn his first NFL win, as he went 13-for-19 with 141 yards and a touchdown pass to help the Panthers snap a seven-game losing streak. "It feels great to come into the locker room after a game like this," said Clausen. "It's a good win for us and hopefully it's something that we can build on. Everything seemed to click pretty well for us today." Jonathan Stewart backed up his quarterback's words beforehand with 137 yards on 27 carries. The Panthers wrapped up their home schedule with a 2-6 mark and will close out the 2010 campaign -- possibly head coach John Fox's last -- with back-to-back road games in Pittsburgh and Atlanta. Fox is winless (0-6) as the visitor this season. Injured quarterback Matt Moore is recovering nicely from shoulder surgery and said he wants to come back next season with the Panthers. Moore, who's eligible to become a free agent after this season, will have to fight for his starting job with Clausen and possibly a draft pick if the Panthers go that route. Moore struggled earlier this season and lost his job to Clausen, but redeemed himself by getting a win over San Francisco. "I feel great," Moore said on the team's site. "My range of motion is good. We're just working slowly on getting some strength back. I'm taking it slow, day by day, but it's getting better." Sunday's win over the Cardinals could lead to bigger and better things, but getting that first road win out of the way is very important to the building blocks of success. Atlanta, for example, just won three straight games as the guest and that's a big reason for its 12-2 record. The Panthers will be there again someday because there's too much talent on the current roster. Linebacker Jon Beason summed it up perfectly Sunday afternoon: "We're a family. This game is real combative, and if you're not a family ... more than friends ... it's tough to win. Today we played as a group, with one heartbeat, and it showed."
