description.hltext_display: 最新数据：1Gb DDR3芯片价格跌破1美元
description.content:
2010-12-22 14:34:56 作者：以军出处：驱动之家责任编辑：邹秋萍 分享至微博
台湾媒体报道，根据内存调研公司集邦科技发布的最新数据，12月份下半个月的1GB DDR3内存芯片的期货价已经下滑到0.91美元，跌破1美元大关;2GB DDR3内存价格目前维持在17-19美元，下降幅度达10.5%。
集邦科技指出，由于供大于求，未来3-6个月内1GB DDR3芯片价格仍将维持在1美元以下。其价格很有可能在明年4月底达到谷底，然后赶在下半年旺季到来前开始恢复。
到明年下半年时，1GB DDR3芯片价格预计将恢复到1.20美元-1.30美元.如果市场需求低于预期，少数供应商将考虑削减产能爱维持价格的稳定。
与价格大幅下滑的DDR3相比，12月下半个月的1GB DDR2价格只有小幅下滑。
现货市场方面，集邦科技的监测数据显示，1GB DDR2价格已经上涨到了1.40美元。集邦科技认为，零售渠道仅支持DDR2内存的廉价芯片组带动了前者需求的上升。

description.hltext_display: Contraloría embargó a Moreno
description.content:
Bogotá. La Contraloría General de la República embargó el patrimonio del alcalde de Bogotá, Samuel Moreno.
Sandra Morelli, contralora General de la República, aclaró que en este caso son medidas cautelares y son preventivas para garantizar los pagos por el supuesto detrimento patrimonial del orden de los 200 mil millones de pesos por el caso de la fase tres de Transmilenio.
"En la medida en que la Contraloría necesite más activos para recuperar el monto calculado de los perjuicios, se tendrán que embargar más bienes", subrayó.
La contralora Morelli señaló que la idea de la investigación no es determinar si hay o no enriquecimiento ilícito y sólo se busca preservar el patrimonio público de los colombianos en el caso de la calle 26.
Agregó que si hay responsabilidad fiscal del Alcalde, se procederá a rematar los bienes y esos dineros van al tesoro público
De acuerdo con la funcionaria, el proceso hace referencia a la situación de la 26, por no tomar los correctivos del caso y en el manejo de los anticipos y las multas entre otros aspectos.
Morelli manifestó que desde el viernes se realizaron las notificaciones correspondientes del proceso de embargos a las entidades bancarias correspondientes.
Aclaró que tampoco tiene información si hubo cambio de bienes o desvíos de los mismos porque no se tiene esa información.
Investigan a Garzón
La Contralora General afirmó que la decisión de su despacho de abrir una investigación al ex alcalde de Bogotá, Luis Eduardo Garzón, hace referencia a la adjudicación de la licitación de la fase tres de Transmilenio, sin los diseños y estudios previos.
No descartó la posibilidad de un embargo de los bienes de Garzón, pero que esa medida va a depender de los resultados que arroje la investigación que se adelanta.
Moreno no renunciará
El alcalde Moreno afirmó que no ha pensado en renunciar o pedir una licitación ante la decisión de la Contraloría.
Expresó que cuenta con un equipo de abogados para trabajar en su defensa y demostrar su inocencia en este caso. "Vamos a tomar los caminos que sean necesarios y vamos a demostrar lo que hemos hecho", subrayó.

description.hltext_display: 학교 경비원에 성희롱 예방교육 의무화
description.content: 서울시교육청은 학교 경비원 근무자는 성희롱 예방교육을 연 2회 이상 이수하도록 � 방침이라� 22일 밝혔다.시교육청은 초·중·� 교 경비원들이 성희롱 예방교육과 장� 인·다문화 가� � 학생에 대한 감수성 교육을 연간 2회 이상 이수하도록 하는 내용을 당직용역 표준계약서에 명시했다.또 경비원이 범죄를 � �지르거나 근무 태만 등의 사� 가 생기면 용역계약을 일방� �으로 해지� 수 있다는 조건을 계약 사항에 포함시켰다.시교육청 측은 "기존에는 업체마다 다른 내용으로 계약을 맺어 왔는데 학교 내에서 발생하는 각종 사� 에 대한 예방과 대응이 미흡� 수 있어 표준계약서를 만� 것"이라� 설명했다.[최은혜기자 grace@]� �작권자 ⓒ `돈이 보이는 리얼타임 뉴스` 머니투데이

description.hltext_display: 2010 in Review
description.content:
Andrew Cuomo campaigning.
Regardless of what may confront him in 2011, Andrew Cuomo had a pretty good year in 2011. That makes him one of the few New York luminaries who did.
For most of the city and state's political players, the year now ending was marked by budget cuts, scandal and overall bad news. And with the City Time controversy breaking into the headlines and more deficits on the horizon, the coming year could bring more of the same.
Until then, though, here are Gotham Gazette's picks for the Top 10 New York stories of 2011.
Coming Up Cuomo
Eight years after his political career appeared to have ended -- and 16 years after his father lost his bid for a fourth term as governor -- Andrew Cuomo resoundingly defeated Republican Carl Paladino to win election as the state's 56th governor.
In many respects, the victory night celebration in Manhattan marked a kind of anticlimax to two and a half years of bizarre twists in the state's politics.
Cuomo's path to victory began in March 2008 when Eliot Spitzer resigned as governor in the wake of reports he frequented high-priced prostitutes. It picked up steam as Gov. David Paterson's brief honeymoon skidded to a halt when he locked horns with the legislature over efforts to cut state spending. Cuomo then got a huge boost when Paterson, weakened and enmeshed in various allegations of wrongdoing (see below), decided not to seek election.
Already blessed with high name recognition, general approval from the public for his performance as state attorney general and a formidable war chest, Cuomo's good fortune continued as the state Republican Party appeared in disarray. In September, Carl Paladino, a multimillionaire real estate developer and Tea Party sympathizer from Buffalo, thrashed the establishment GOP candidate, Rick Lazio, in the primary.
Paladino's upset win -- along with his plain speaking on the mess in Albany -- brought him a quick spike in the polls. His campaign, though, quickly foundered amid accounts of pornographic and racists emails and other bizarre behavior --including rantings about gays, a physical confrontation with a Post reporter and wandering off in search of the bathroom in the middle of the only gubernatorial debate.
For his part, Cuomo ran a tightly controlled race, offering few specifics about how he would cut the state spending by billions or other policy areas. The move paid off on Election Day, as he came away with more than 61 percent of the vote.
From Hearst to Tweed
Photo by Kaplan101
New schools chancellor Cathleen Black
On Nov. 9, after eight years as schools chancellor, Joel Klein announced his resignation. Talk of Klein's leaving had been wafting around for months, if not years, so the real surprise in the City Hall press conference was not that -- but rather Mayor Michael Bloomberg's choice to succeed him: Cathleen Black, the chair of Hearst magazines.
The choice startled just about everyone, and in the days and weeks to come began to appear ever more confounding. While Bloomberg praised Black -- who travels in many of the same moneyed circles as the mayor -- as a world class manager, it rapidly emerged she had no experience in public education and as far as anyone could tell, little interest in it.
With critics describing the appointment as "a slap in the face' to the city's public school parents and teachers, and an example of croneyism, efforts mounted to block Black. State education commission David Steiner -- the one person with the legal authority to stop the appointment -- appointed a panel to advise him on whether to grant Black the waiver she would need to become chancellor, given her lack of education experience. That group voted against the waiver.
Steiner -- apparently nervous at the prospect of saying no to Bloomberg -- then engineered a compromise that would require Black to name an education deputy in return for his OK. She or someone (Bloomberg? Klein? Patricia Harris?) selected educator Shael Polakow-Suransky.
Window-dressing or not, it closed the deal for Steiner who promptly gave his blessing to Black. It did little or nothing to mollify some politicians and parents. Legal efforts to block Black will be heard in an Albany court on Thursday.
No End in Sight
In June Mayor Michael Bloomberg and the City Council http://www.gothamgazette.com/article/searchlight/20100625/203/3299">agreed to a budget that cut $1 billion in spending. Although less draconian than the mayor had originally threatened -- it did not, for example shut down any city libraries or lay off teachers -- the approved budget still pared city services. Some senior centers and day care site closed, for example, and libraries cut hours. The city also raised some fees- -- though not taxes.
And the cuts apparently did not go deep enough. Last month, Bloomberg unveiled a new round of $1.6 billion in reductions -- many of which could take effect without the council's approval. They represented the ninth round of slashes in the last three years. This time the cuts are slated to fall on libraries (as usual), the Administration for Children's Services, the fire department -- which plans to some companies shut during evening hours -- and Homeless Services. The plan also calls for teacher layoffs over the next 18 months, something averted in the spring when Bloomberg froze teacher salaries.
As the year ended, council members held hearings and denounced the cuts. Whether they could avert any remains to be seen.
But whatever happens with that, the worst could still come. In announcing the cuts last month, Deputy Mayor Stephen Goldsmith said even with the latest cuts, the city still faces a $2.4 billion shortfall for fiscal year 2012. Discussions on that begin early next year.
And the state could be in even worse shape. After a year in which the legislature and governor proved unable or unwilling to tackle the state's fiscal woes, the government faces a deficit estimated at $9 billion to $14 billion for the next fiscal year.
A Widening Net
Investigators began probing possible scandal at the New York state pension funds in 2006. But this year more people and firms fell, as Attorney General Andrew Cuomo seemed intent on wrapping up as many strands in the probe as possible before moving on to his new job.
In the "pay to play scandal," then State Comptroller Alan Hevesi and some of his associates used the state's $122 billion pension fund to reward financiers and firms that supported their campaigns, gave them money or did other favors. (Hevesi resigned in 2006 in the wake of allegations that now seem almost quaint.) In October, Hevesi pleaded guilty to having take $1 million in money and favors.
Last month, one of Hevesi's closest associates, former political consultant Hank Morris, reached a plea bargain on what has been described as a "minor charge." Morris reportedly took $19 million in fees for himself.
Altogether as of early November, six people in addition to Hevesi and Morris have pleaded guilty in connection with the probe, 16 firms have settled, and more than $139 million has been paid to the fund and the state, according to Cuomo.
Cuomo, though, has not been able to wrap up the case of Steven Rattner, the former Obama administration car czar and investment advisor to Mayor Michael Bloomberg. Rattner has agreed to pay $6.2 million to the Securities and Exchange Commission for his involvement in the kickback scheme. Cuomo has filed two lawsuits against Ratter seeking at least $26 million. The fight between the two men has turned nasty, with Cuomo describing Rattmer's behavior as "the most egregious" of all the skullduggery into the pension fund case -- and calling Rattner a liar to boot.
The Really High Cost of Yankee Tickets
Photo by Azi Paybarah
David Paterson, last February, shortly before announcing he would not seek election to a full term as governor
Gov. David Paterson's really, really bad year started with a storm of rumors in February that the New York Times was at work on a story about him that would prove so damaging he would have to resign. Sex? Drugs?
Whatever the paper may -- or may not -- have unearthed about Paterson's personal proclivities, on Feb. 16, what many believed to be the story came out -- and it concerned not Paterson but a close confidant: David Johnson. Johnson had been arrested on drug charges as a teenager, the article said, and for assault in the 1990s. He also had, it continued, "on three occasions been involved in altercations with women, two of which led to calls to the police." That piece, New York magazine commented, met with "widespread media disappointment."
But eight days later, the paper published the bombshell. It reported that Paterson and members of the state police persuaded Johnson's former girlfriend to abandon her efforts to seek an order of protection against Johnson, who she charged, assaulted her in her apartment on Halloween night.
Two days later, with Attorney General (and potential political rival) Andrew Cuomo looking into the case -- at Paterson's request -- Paterson announced he would not seek re-election in November.
Months later, former Chief Judith Kaye, assigned by Cuomo to conduct the probe, determined Paterson made errors of judgement in the matter but did not break the law.
The governor did not fare as well in another case that came under Kaye's scrutiny: his alleged acceptance of free World Series tickets. Kaye found Paterson might have committed perjury when he told state investigators he had always planned to pay for the tickets to the opening game of the 2009 series. Earlier this week, the state ethics commission fined Paterson $62,125 for soliciting and taking the tickets -- a hefty premium for tickets that, had he gotten them the normal way, would have set him back $2,125. Meanwhile Albany District Attorney David Soares reportedly is continuing to investigate the possible perjury charges.
As for Johnson, he was arraigned on misdemeanor assault charges in August. Last month, Paterson officially fired Johnson, who had been suspended without pay since February.
Grade Deflation
New York City's vaunted leap in student achievement under Mayor Michael Bloomberg took a major hit this summer as the state Department of Education changed its scale for grading the tests. Responding to widespread criticism that scores had risen because tests had gotten dumber -- not that students had gotten smarter -- in the last several years, the state raised the score a student must reach to be considered "proficient" in English language arts and math.
The new scoring had only 54 percent of students in grades three through eight last school year meeting the standard for math -- down from 82 percent the previous year -- and 42.4 percent in language arts down from 69 percent the previous year.
The new system also found that, instead of narrowing as Bloomberg and his school chancellor Joel Klein had long proclaimed, the achievement gap between races had widened. Many blacks and Latinos had, apparently, scored at the lower end of the proficient category and so were knocked out of the category when the state raised its bar.
Despite the new scores, Bloomberg stood by his program. "There is a lot of evidence we are making great progress," he said. "Everybody basically knows this is working."
Power Loss
On Dec. 2 the House of Representative voted to censure Rep. Charles Rangel, for years the most powerful member of New York's House delegation. Although Rangel faces no criminal charges, the 333 to 79 vote delivered a harsh and very rare rebuke to the Harlem congressman, who had briefly served as chair of the powerful House Ways and Means Committee.
Rangel stood accused of failing to pay taxes on a vacation home in the Dominican Republic, of filing misleading financial disclosure forms and of improperly soliciting donations from corporations with business before his committee for a center named in his honor at City University of New York.
Following the censure, Rangel said he made mistakes but "there was no decpeiton involved."
Although Rangel was already facing ethics charges during last fall's campaign, he handily turned back challengers in both the primary and the general election. He has said he plans to serve out his current term but many suspect it will be his last.
If You See Something...
Acting on a tip from a street vendor, police on May 1 disarmed a crude -- and smoking car bomb -- in the heart of Times Square on a Saturday night. Although the device, made of propane, gasoline and fireworks packed in a Nissan Pathfinder -- appeared crude, Mayor Michael Bloomberg said it still could have killed people and created havoc. "We were very lucky," he said.
The threat prompted the evacuation of thousands of tourists and other in the busy area, left people shut out of their hotels and forced cancellation of some Broadway shows.
Two days later, police arrested Faisal Shahzad, a naturalized U.S. citizen from Pakistan, for placing the bomb. In June, he pleaded guilty, telling the court that the U.S. should withdraw its troops from Afghanistan and Iraq and end its drone raids there or face further attacks. In October, a judge sentenced him to life in prison.
While many aspects of Shahzad's plan appeared amateurish, evidence emerged in subsequent days that the Pakistani Taliban may have played a role in the aborted attack and that Shazad had had bomb training in Pakistan.
Crime Capital
Continuing in the footsteps of former Majority Senate Majority Leader Joseph Bruno and former State Assemblymember Brian McLaughlin, members of the state legislature continued their record of wrongdoing in 2010.
Leading the rogues gallery was Pedro Espada, until very recently State Senate majority leader and New York's highest ranking Latino politician. Last week, Espada and his son were indicted for allegedly siphoning more than half a million dollars from a group of health clinics they run -- and using it to pay for home improvements, a serious sushi habit and other expenses. Espada, who denies any wrongdoing, also faces a civil lawsuit charging he stole many millions more from those clinics, which are supposed to care for poor people in the Bronx.
Espada lost his re-election bid in September's primary.
In February, the Senate removed one of the miscreants in its midst -- Hiram Monserrate -- following his 2009 conviction on misdemeanor charges arising from a dispute with his girlfriend. (Monserrate won acquittal on far more serious charges involving slashing the woman with a broken glass.) In expelling Monserrate -- the first senator to suffer that fate in almost century -- the senators said they were taking a strong stand against domestic voiletce. His supporters, though, said he was being singled out for bucking the party leadership, and some charged he was the victim of anti-Latino prejudice.
Out of politics, Monserrate, though, is not out of trouble. In October, he was indicted on charges of fraud and conspiracy dating back to his days as a member of City Council. The charges allege that Monserrate steered some of his member items money to a nonprofit he controlled and used the funds to help fiunance a run for the State Senate. (The indictment is part of the ongoing federal investigation in abuses involving member items
Other legislators in trouble in 2010:
--Former Queens State Assemblymember Anthny Seminerio was sentenced to six years in prison in February after pleading guilty to charges that he improperly solicited money from people and organizations who had business with the state.
--Earlier this month, State Sen. Kevin Parker of Brooklyn was convicted of misdemeanor charges arising from his attack on a New York Post photographer. Parker, who has been in trouble for fighting with people before, won acquittal on felony charges in the assault, but could still face expulsion from the Senate.
--And just in case you thought only legislators from New York City got in hot water, earlier this month, former State Sen. Vincent Leibell pleaded guilty to federal obstruction of justice and tax evasion charges. He had been slated to become Putnam County executive next month -- but now could end up going to jail instead.
Flip Flop
After just two years in Democratic hands, the State Senate will return to Republican control when the new legislature takes office next month. Although a number of seats shifted, the decisive move for the GOP came in a ruling by a state Supreme Court judge that declared Jack Martins the winner over incumbent State Sen. Craig Johnson ion a Long Island district. The state's highest court upheld the decision this week.
Democrats had had a razor thin 32-30 vote edge, and the Republican margin will be just as small. Whether that will mean another two years of turmoil and gridlock in the upper chamber remains to be seen. Of course, the new majority leader, Dean Skelos, tried to turn back such fears. "We're prepared to work with the governor-elect and all of the members of the State Legislature to do the people's business, and look forward to a productive 2011 legislative session," he said.
Discuss this Article
Other Related Articles:
Council Hopes to Block Service Cuts to Protect Children(2010-12-22)
Council Approves Bill to Require School Safety Reports(2010-12-21)
With State Parks at Risk, Advocates Seek New Funding Sources(2010-12-20)
City Steps Up Efforts to Court Bioscience(2010-12-17)
Same-Sex Marriage, Abortion on Crowded Civil Rights Agenda (2010-12-16)
Senate Gamble Could Send Horseracing into its Final Lap(2010-12-15)
Experience Shows Living Wage Policies Work(2010-12-14)

description.hltext_display: 为你的公司打造服务型存储系统（上）
description.content:
2010-12-22 14:54:17 作者：刘凯出处：存储在线责任编辑：邹秋萍 分享至微博
如果它尚未发生，那么它必将很快到来。如果你是一位数据存储管理领域的专业人员，可能偶尔会被要求将你的IT系统向ITIL(Information Technology Infrastructure Library，信息技术框架库)服务管理框架靠拢。但是，在你目瞪口呆并且心想这只不过又是若干IT管理理论中的一种的时候，请你再思考一下：ITIL可以让你的工作，甚至你的生活，变得更加简单容易。
ITIL是一系列的最佳实践，这些实践提供了一个关于如何实施IT服务管理(ITSM)的向导，它是一个针对如何面对和降低IT组织复杂度而设计的框架。作为一名存储专业人员，如果你认为你目前正在花费大量的时间在下列的任何一项或者所有项目上，那么你便可以从ITIL的部署中受益。
• 正在处理与存储无关的事情或者工作
• 由于设计缺陷，你不得不重新部署存储系统
• 电话支持
• 维护与存储无关的跟踪工具(本地变化或者事故/需求工具)
• 制作几乎不引人注意的一次性报告
• 资产管理
• 与其他团队协作
• 正花费精力在一些不能充分满足终端用户需求的或者投资回报率不大的项目上
• 对存储事故负责
• 对你的存储技术提升没有帮助的事情
存储管理这个主题并不是空穴来风。每个存储团队都会维护一个长长的列表，其中记录着将要与其直接或者间接合作的所有其他团队：终端用户、桌面IT维护、呼叫中心、一线或者二线操作支持、监控、服务器、安全、资产、记账、配置、架构、工程部门以及财务部门等。如果所有上述这些接口尚不完善，那么存储团队还不得不提供良好的报告给所有级别的管理部门以确保所有可操作的事宜都被满足。从一个存储管理团队的角度来讲，ITSM的目标并不是去指导一个存储管理员如何去做他们的工作，而是聚焦在以下两点上：
• 引领存储团队与其他团队之间配合的更好，以便达到组织上的目标。
• 在可能的时候，充分自动化利用公共流程和工具。
从ITIL自身的角度来讲，存储管理被归类于“技术管理功能”，基于此，ITIL引领存储团队关注以下几个方面：
• 维护存储技能、支持文档以及维护日程表。
• 编写流程以及培训一线的桌面IT维护人员、呼叫中心以及操作支持团队。
• 与存储厂商保持必要的关系。

description.hltext_display: Xerox Rises 0.85% on Heavy Volume: Watch For Potential Pullback (XRX)
description.content:
Xerox (NYSE:XRX) traded in a range yesterday that spanned from a low of $11.79 to a high of $11.92. Yesterday, the shares gained 0.85%, which took the trading range above the 3-day high of $11.86 on volume of 5.4 million shares. Often times after large one-day gains, short term traders will seek to take profits and, as such, investors should be cautious.
Shares of Xerox are currently trading above their 50-day moving average (MA) of $11.57 and above their 200-day MA of $10.07. Look for the MA to provide support for a short-term pullback in the shares.
SmarTrend currently has shares of Xerox in an Uptrend and issued the Uptrend alert on September 13, 2010 at $9.79. The stock has risen 20.6% since the Uptrend alert was issued.
SmarTrend expects the share price to pullback toward the $11.86 support level. Afterwards, we expect it to move upward with its peers in the SmarTrend Electronic Equipment industry.
Keywords: xerox trading range stock news

description.hltext_display: Autofahrer beschädigt linken Außenspiegel
description.content: Schwanewede (lr). Die Polizei sucht Zeugen einer Verkehrsunfallflucht, die sich am Freitag zwischen 7.30 und 8 Uhr in der Stettiner Straße in Schwanewede ereignet hat. Ein Fahrzeug, welches vermutlich in Richtung Posener Straße unterwegs war, streifte im Vorbeifahren einen rechts am Straßenrand stehenden grünen VW Passat. Hierdurch wurde der linke Außenspiegel des Passats beschädigt. Das Fahrzeug des Unfallverursachers müsste folglich an der rechten Fahrzeugseite, vornehmlich ebenfalls am Außenspiegel, beschädigt sein. Hinweise zum Unfallverursacher nimmt die Polizei unter der Telefonnummer 04209/91469115 entgegen.

description.hltext_display: 현대차, `365일 찾아가는 시승서비스` 실시
description.content: [보도자료] 연말까지 시범 운영… 내년 1월 3일부터 시행현대자동차(회장 � �몽구)는 업계 최초로 `365일 찾아가는 시승서비스`를 오는 31일까지 시범운영 후 내년 1월3일(월)부터 본격� �으로 실시한다� 22일 밝혔다.`365일 찾아가는 시승서비스`는 ‘Any time, Wherever you are (언� �� 당� 이 어디에 있� )’을 서비스 콘셉트로 � 객이 원하는 시간과 장소에 � �문 담당직원이 예약한 차를 가지� 방문하는 � 객 맞춤형 시승 서비스다.현대차는 수입차 업체에서도 � 례를 찾아볼 수 없는 파격� �인 ‘365일 찾아가는 시승서비스’를 시작으로 2011년 한 해 동안 ‘� 객의 생각을 먼� � 생각한다’는 콘셉트로 다양한 � 객감동 마케팅을 지속� �으로 실시 � 계획이다.`365일 찾아가는 시승서비스`를 희망하는 � 객은 현대차 홈페이지(www.hyundai.com) 및 � �국 12개의 시승센터를 통해 � 청� 수 있으며, 차량 반납 역시 담당 직원이 시승이 종료되는 장소에서 차를 인수해 � 객 편의성을 극대화시키는 방식으로 진행된다.현대차는 오는 31일까지 서울, 부산, 인천, 대구, 광주, 대� � 등 6대 광역시 12개 대형 시승센터를 위주로 `365일 찾아가는 시승서비스`를 시범운영하� , 개� � �을 보완해 내년 1월 3일부터 본격� �으로 시행하는 한편 시승센터도 � �국 30개로 확대� 예� �이다.현대차 관계자는 “이번 ‘365일 찾아가는 시승서비스’는 평소 차에 관한 � 객의 생각을 � � �해 � � �히 � 객의 입장에서 준비한 프로그램이다”며 “현대차는 앞으로 ‘� 객만족 최우� ’의 가치를 실현하는 혁� � �인 마케팅을 통해 프리미엄 브랜드로 도약� 것”이라� 밝혔다.(대한민국 중심언� CBS 뉴스FM98.1 / 음악FM93.9 / TV CH 412)www.nocutnews.co.kr) 무단� �재 및 재배포 금지

description.hltext_display: 专访飞康新任CEO：云时代下,我们更懂数据保护
description.content:
2010-12-22 00:00:05 作者：袁绍龙出处：比特网责任编辑：袁绍龙 分享至微博
【引子】从夏恩软件(Cheyenne Software)到飞康软件(Falconstor)，飞康新任CEO James P. McNiel见证了数据保护20多年的发展史，在存储领域走向巨头林立、兼并整合的大趋势下， James P. McNiel带领下的飞康公司会如何面对越来越激烈的市场竞争呢？飞康公司的战略又会发生哪些改变呢？
2010年12月，飞康新任CEO James P. McNiel进行了上任后的首次访华，这期间拜访了飞康中国区的各个客户、OEM合作伙伴、渠道商等外，还首次向媒体宣布了飞康公司全新的战略：Defining Data Protect,Again，随着云计算时代的到来，飞康希望再一次定义云时代下的数据保护!
飞康未来战略核心---品牌化和用户
飞康公司自从2000年成立之后，一直致力于数据保护领域的技术变革与创新，经过十年的发展，以技术见长的飞康公司在OEM合作伙伴中获得了高度的认可，这也是为什么十年间飞康屡次传出被大公司收购的传闻。James P. McNiel作为飞康最新一任舵手，面对这些收购的传闻又会持有何种观点？
James P. McNiel对此明确表示：“飞康公司当前的首要任务为成长我们的业务和帮助解决用户的问题，最近几年，存储市场发生了较多的收购，但是飞康的理想仍然是成为一家强大、独立的软件公司。”
过去的十年，是飞康公司飞速发展的十年。然而，过于依靠OEM合作伙伴的商业模式，也使得飞康公司业务发展遇到一个瓶颈期，如何突破这种过于依靠OEM的业务模式就成为考验新CEO的首要任务。James P. McNiel非常坦诚的认为飞康在产品改进、听取用户需求方面还需要有更大的改进。
James P. McNiel认为：“飞康公司会在策略上做出重大的改变，未来将会加强品牌化的建设和更多的以用户为中心。在品牌化方面，公司未来会把运营方向更多的向品牌化发展，改变过去过于依赖OEM合作伙伴的策略，更多的面向用户推广自主品牌。”
“另外，飞康未来会更多的以用户为中心，这就需要我们的产品更多的贴近用户，过去飞康的产品在技术性上具有领先性，那时我们更多的是研发人员和OEM合作伙伴的意见居多;现在飞康将要改变这种局面，在产品的可靠性、可用性和可管理性(简称：RUM计划)上下功夫。我本人始终相做伟大的产品最好的办法就是聆听用户的心声” James P. McNiel认为飞康今后将更加贴近用户。
图一：飞康新任CEO James P. McNiel先生接受比特网采访。作为飞康新舵手，他用“当你下决心做某事，你必须真诚的承认它的存在。”这句话来阐述飞康启动未来战略的决心！
据了解，飞康公司在一个月之前已经启动了RUM计划，该计划旨在改善研发流程和内部质量管理，让内部员工更加深刻的检讨产品质量。同时，飞康公司已经在北美成立的客户咨询委员会和渠道伙伴咨询委员会，一改过去侧重OEM合作伙伴意见的为主，更多的听取来自用户的反馈。
对于一家致力于独立发展的软件公司，要想在市场上不被吞并、保持独立发展，则需要选择一条最适合自己生存与发展的道路。过去飞康可以依赖着OEM合作伙伴保持业务的快速增长，然而现在的存储市场已经飞速发展，甚至几年以后将超过服务器市场，这也就是为什么IBM、HP、Dell、Oracle等服务器巨头们近年来拼命在存储市场拓展的原因，就连存储巨头EMC公司也多次传出被收购的传闻。中小规模的存储公司必须要有更加准确的领域定位以及长期经营的雄心，才能够在市场上生存下去。那么，在云时代即将到来之际，飞康希望再一次定义数据保护，飞康的数据保护理念和产品又会发生哪些改变呢？
“云时代下，我们更懂数据保护”
“Defining Data Protect， Again”-- James P. McNiel认为这个口号其实就是夏恩软件的一个续集，夏恩软件当年发明了通过网络进行备份的体系架构，首个客户端-服务器存储管理解决方案ARCserve开创了备份/恢复技术领域的先河，至今EMC、Symantec、CA等行业巨头仍然沿用该网络备份体系架构。
事实上，过去传统的备份架构与模式已经越来越不能适应当前企业数据增长的需求，现在企业数据都是PB级的量级，巨大的数据量使得企业在备份思路上跟过去已经完全不同，这也是为什么像重复数据删除技术、快照技术在最近几年获得厂商和用户青睐的原因。与此同时，大数据量必然会给恢复带来巨大的压力，7X24小时的业务连续性要求实质上对备份窗口提出了越来越苛刻的要求;外加上企业用户数据中心逐渐完成服务器、网络、存储虚拟化，使得用户在数据保护上的工作难题提升到了前所未有的高度。
“某种角度来看，数据中心走向全面虚拟化是云计算发展的必然，而这也极大的改变了数据备份体系架构和数据保护理念，今天的虚拟化环境决定了单一硬件载体上集中了越来越多数据和应用。”James P. McNiel认为云的发展极大的改变了数据保护。
而根据飞康方面透露，明年第一季度，飞康公司将升级一系列软件产品，对于飞康公司更重要的是，具有划时代意义、专门针对云环境的下一代产品将在明年正式推出。
James P. McNiel对飞康下一代产品充满期待：“我们要为云、为未来做事情，云计算带来的不仅仅是商业模式上的变革，还给应用、服务等模式带来的革新，传统的IT应用被整合成服务的方式才能够被应用，过去传统的数据保护仍然集中在备份、文件、数据块这些方面，但是事实上，我们忽略了一大事实，随着云计算越来越深入人心，用户的IT部门越来越看重是否能够提供IT服务的可靠性，这才是他们最为关心的。然而我们一些数据保护厂商仍然在谈怎么保护文件、数据块。”
事实上，业内诸多存储软件厂商已经纷纷推出针对云环境的产品，比如Symantec在今年中旬推出了针对云存储的NetBackup Connector和Backup Exec Connector，将OST从物理环境整合到云环境之中;而CommVault在今年推出的最新一代数据管理软件Simpana 9.0，也着重强调了对云环境的数据管理功能……
“公共云有两种，一种是聪明的云，另外一种笨的云。我们会发现，所谓的笨的云其实就是网络大优盘，没有同步、灾备、恢复之后的回切等，这种云只能够存放一些不重要的数据;而聪明的云其实就是带有智能的云，不仅仅需要同步、灾备、回切这些数据保护，还需要应用能够很快的启动、管理界面能够在任何地方浏览等。更为重要的是，云计算环境将无比复杂，而复杂、异构环境下的数据保护正是飞康一直的强项。未来，飞康将在一个界面中管理所有的业务连续业务，通过一个界面来定义针对服务、应用的策略。”James P. McNiel这样阐述云时代下的数据保护理念。
“云时代下，需要独立产品来保护未来”
当前存储领域正迎来一场空前的变革，所有厂商纷纷调整自己的产品与市场思路，要么通过收购弥补技术缺陷、要么通过改变交互方式来满足用户需求。比如说，Symantec公司一改过去以软件交付给用户的模式，推出了软硬件结合的解决方案提供给用户;而EMC、IBM、NetApp、HP则让自己软硬件产品结合的愈加紧密。
人们看到了愈加趋于整合、一站式的解决方案，但无可厚非的是，数据中心经过多年的建设，异构环境这种局面是不会轻易改变的。“我必须明确的是，云计算的复杂性是非常大的，这种异构、复杂环境下的数据管理必然是云计算时代下数据保护的首要挑战。”James P. McNiel表示道。
“对于客户来说，开放的软件平台能够带来更大的价值，这也需要软件厂商在开发成本、技术复杂性上下更大的功夫，而在指定硬件上来开发软件是相对容易多的，这种软硬件捆绑必然会对客户架构带来巨大的限制。举个例子，如果为了保存在EMC阵列上的数据，只能通过购买EMC的数据保护产品，那用户将会被严重限制，独立的软件解决方案其实就是帮助用户从锁定中解放出来。”James P. McNiel认为独立的产品才适应云时代下的发展。
云存储的出现颠覆了传统数据保护的一些理念，有些厂商甚至大幅调整产品线来“迎接”这种颠覆，比如说NetApp公司，从2009年开始即停止了VTL产品的研发。NetApp认为数据保护已经到了D2D的时代，NetApp大中华区系统技术及专业服务部总经理冯诚昌在今年SNW大会上就向笔者表示：“NetApp认为备份不一定非要用到VTL，VTL是一种中间层的产品，是为了磁带使用方便，未来会被套牢，NetApp认为D2D的方式在将来会更加有效，更加能体现业务的需求。”(详情请见：比特网独家分析：2010 SNW 中国大会采访记)
飞康显然并不认同NetApp这种观点，James P. McNiel对此表示：“云计算的到来，意味着需要真正的保护未来，可以确定的是，数据生命周期会远远超过我们的想象。过去，用户已经在传统备份上投入了大量的资金和精力，并且用户的数据保存时间一定会非常长。十年之后，当我们再在这里讨论数据保护时，一定会发现仍然会有很多用户使用磁带保护数据，磁盘保护数据并不会有足够长的生命周期。最简单一个例子，未来出现光磁带，那NetApp将怎么办？”
飞康认为真正的数据保护会是磁盘—近线—云服务的异地备份，理解用户在传统备份上的投资非常重要，需要厂商们提供一个数据迁移方案来解决过去那些挑战。
持续支持飞康中国的发展
最近几年，飞康在国内取得了众多成绩、在金融、保险、证券、制造、教育、医疗等行业都获得了大量的客户，James P. McNiel对中国市场会有何期待呢？
对此，James P. McNiel表示：“中国是飞康战略中非常重要的一部分，过去飞康中国取得了非常出色的成绩，我本人也保证飞康中国将继续获得总部的支持，我们会从中国获取的大部分利润反投入中国业务的发展，并且还将持续扩大中国研发机构，同时，会更多的听取中国用户的需求和声音!”
最后，James P. McNiel用一个月球送人的例子来比喻数据保护工作：“数据保护和月球送人具有同样的道理，把人送上月球是相对容易的，但是更关键的是如何安全的送回来，数据保护是一样的道理，这就需要下一代数据保护产品需要像岩石一样坚硬可靠。飞康的产品在性能和功能已经非常出色，我们将进一步提升产品的稳定性，使得它们能够适应适应云时代的需求。”

description.hltext_display: Schüler engagieren sich für "gute Schulen"
description.content:
Hambergen. Samtgemeindebürgermeister Bernd Lütjen ist beeindruckt. Innerhalb von zwei Wochen haben die zehn Schülervertreter der Kooperativen Gesamtschule Hambergen 45 Unterschriften für die Aktion "Volksbegehren für gute Schulen - Bildung, Chancen, Perspektiven" zusammengetragen. Mit diesen betrug die Zahl der gültigen Stimmen, die jüngst aus dem Rathaus an den Landeswahlleiter in Hannover gemeldet wurden, 1005. Damit lehnen über zehn Prozent der über 18-jährigen wahlberechtigten Hamberger das Abitur nach zwölf Jahren ab. Seit dem 13. November 2009 läuft das Volksbegehren. Ziel der Initiatoren ist es, das Land dazu zu bewegen, die Regelschulzeit bis zum Abitur an Gymnasien und Gesamtschulen wieder auf 13 Jahre zu verlängern. Weiter fordern sie, die Gründung von Gesamtschulen zu erleichtern und den Fortbestand der Vollen Halbtagsschule zu garantieren. Zehn Prozent der Wahlberechtigten in Niedersachsen müssen dieses Begehren unterschreiben. Bis zum 2. Mai 2011 bleibt dafür Zeit. Dann endet die Frist. "Wenn wir diese 608731 Stimmen zusammenhaben, muss das Gesetz geändert werden", sagt Bernd Lütjen. Bislang haben 177242 Wähler niedersachsenweit das Volksbegehren unterzeichnet.
Klassensprecher ins Boot holen
"Viele Menschen, mit denen wir gesprochen haben, kannten dieses Volksbegehren gar nicht", erzählt KGS-Schülervertreterin Stefanie Lütjen. Meist habe es sich dabei um Leute mit kleinen Kindern gehandelt oder um Familien mit Kindern, die längst aus der Schule raus sind. Als sie von Stefanie Lütjen, Olivia Große, Swantje Hübeler und den übrigen sieben Schülervertretern über die Gründe des Volksbegehrens informiert wurden, hätten sie die Aktion sofort für gut befunden und ohne zu zögern unterschrieben, erzählen die Jugendlichen. Andere, die bereits über das Volksbegehren Bescheid wussten, hätten die Entscheidung des Landes, wie etwa das Abitur nach zwölf Jahren einzuführen, heftig kritisiert, erzählt Stefanie Lütjen.
Mit 1005 Unterschriften hat die Samtgemeinde übrigens ihre zehn Prozent erfüllt, bemerkt Bernd Lütjen. "Wir haben 9500 Wahlberechtigte." Die Schüler wollen es bei den 1005 nicht belassen. Anfang 2011 wollen sie sich mit allen 35 Klassensprechern treffen. Alle Schüler der KGS sollen weitere Unterschriften zusammentragen.
"Ich finde die Initiative sehr gut", sagt der Samtgemeindebürgermeister, dessen Verwaltung einmal im Monat die Unterschriften nach Hannover meldet. Zwar seien die 177242 Stimmen weit von den rund 610000 nötigen Unterschriften entfernt. Aber schon an der Zahl könne man eigentlich nicht vorbeigehen, findet er: "Bis zum 2. Mai haben wir ja noch Zeit."

description.hltext_display: Liikennekuolemien määrä tuplaantui marraskuussa
description.content:
Tieliikenteessä kuoli lähes tuplasti enemmän ihmisiä marraskuussa kuin vuosi sitten.
Kuolleita oli yhdeksän enemmän ja loukkaantuneita 96 enemmän kuin viime vuonna, kertoo Tilastokeskus.
- Viime vuonna marraskuu oli aika lailla musta. Nyt lumikelit ja liukkaat säät tulivat aiemmin, sanoo aktuaari Raini Östlund Tilastokeskuksesta.
Tieliikenteessä sattui marraskuussa 474 henkilövahinkoon johtanutta onnettomuutta. Niissä loukkaantui yli 600 ihmistä ja kuoli 19.
Kuolleista 15 oli autoilijoita. Lisäksi kuoli kolme jalankulkijaa ja yksi polkupyöräilijä. Valtaosa kuolleista oli miehiä.
Marraskuun kuolleisuusluvut muodostavat vain pienen piikin tilastoissa. Tieliikenteessä kuolleiden määrä on jatkuvasti laskenut viimeisen kahdenkymmenen vuoden ajan, kertoo Tilastokeskus.

description.hltext_display: 戴尔收购Compellent遭起诉 被指价格过低
description.content:
2010-12-22 13:43:58 作者：ZD出处：ZDnet责任编辑：邹秋萍 分享至微博
北京时间12月21日消息，据国外媒体报道，一家总部位于美国密歇根州的投资基金公司日前把数据存储厂商Compellent Technologies(以下简称“Compellent”)告上法庭，称Compellent出售给戴尔的价格过低。
基尼斯县(Genesee County)员工退休基金在12月17日的诉讼中指出，戴尔每股27.75美元的收购价格过低。该诉讼指出，戴尔的收购价格“非常低并且对Compellent的真正市场价值大打折扣”。
在此之前，华盛顿律师事务所Finkelstein Thompson曾表示，将对戴尔收购Compellent的公正性展开调查。截至目前，戴尔发言人杰西布莱克本(Jess Blackburn)对此未置可否。
戴尔在12月13日宣布，将以每股27.75美元现金收购数据存储厂商Compellent，除去Compellent拥有现金，戴尔要支付大约8.2亿美元现金。交易将于2011年初完成。在此之前，戴尔宣布计划以每股27.5美元的价格收购Compellent所有普通流通股。在过去两个月，受收购消息影响，Compellent股价上涨近一倍。
收购Compellent，将有助于戴尔扩大其数据中心业务，如服务器和存储领域，并减少对毛利率较低的台式机和笔记本市场的依赖。Compellent的技术将使得戴尔能够更好地帮助消费者存储、恢复和管理大规模数据。
戴尔股价周一在纳斯达克市场常规交易中下跌0.28美元，跌幅为2.05%，报收于13.36美元。过去52周，戴尔最低股价为11.34美元，最高股价为17.52美元。按照周一的收盘价计算，戴尔的市值约为257.9亿美元。

description.hltext_display: HTC Incredible HD: Erste Bilder und Infos
description.content:
Bild vergrößern 560 336 http://img1.magnus.de/HTC-Incredible-HD-r560x336-C-8d955b05-39048147.jpg © slashgear
Das HTC Incredible HD, das auch unter dem Namen HTC Mecha auftaucht, soll ein LTE-Smartphone sein und eine Frontkamera besitzen.
Diverse US-Blogs haben einige Foto-Puzzlezeile vom HTC Incredible HD veröffentlicht. Wie für einzelne Puzzle-Teile üblich, ergeben sie zwar kein Gesamtbild, aber verraten Details. So kann man auf einem Bild (siehe Bildergalerie unten) die HTC-typisch hochwertige Verarbeitung erkennen.
Auf einem anderen Bild gibt es einen Blick unter die Haube und auf die 8-Megapixel-Kamera samt Doppelblitz. Dank den Bildern wissen wir nun auch, dass HTC das Incredible HD, wie seine anderen HTC-Kollegen, mit einem Micro-USB-Anschluss versieht. Zu guter Letzt kann man aus dem Bild der Rückseite ersehen, dass das Gerät wohl einen Aufsteller hat und relativ große ist - vermutlich sitzt vorne ein 4,3 Zoll großes Display.
Spekulationen zu dem HTC Incredible HD, das hin und wieder auch unter dem Namen HTC Mecha auftaucht, besagen, dass das Smartphone bereits mit der LTE-Technik (Long Term Evolution) ausgerüstet ist. Der Mobilfunkstandard der 4. Generation erlaubt schnellere Datenraten und soll auch in ländlichen Gebieten verfügbar sein. Allerdings kann man damit rechnen, dass das HTC Incredible HD zunächst in den USA bei Verizon erscheint, da der Anbieter dort ein Treiber für LTE ist.
Was das Betriebssystem angeht, setzen die Gerüchte auf Android 2.2. Wobei Android 2.3 wegen der Unterstützung von Frontkameras bzw. Videotelefonie mehr Sinn machen würde. Die neue Sense-Oberfläche wäre auf dem Gerät ebenfalls vorstellbar. Als Präsentations-Event wäre die Consumer Electronics Show (CES) in Las Vegas Anfang Januar 2011 ein guter Kandidat.
HTC Incredible HD: Erste Bilder 1 von 6
Bild vergrößern >
HTC Incredible HD: Erste Bilder

description.hltext_display: Susto por incidente aéreo
description.content:
Medellín. Tremendo susto se llevaron la noche del lunes el ministro de Protección Social, Mauricio Santamaría; y el gobernador de Sucre, Jorge Barraza Farak, luego de que se reportara un incidente en el avión que los transportaba desde Corozal (Sucre) hacia la ciudad de Medellín.
La Aeronave de la Fuerza Aérea tuvo problemas en el tren de aterrizaje, lo que obligó a sobrevolar poco más de una hora y luego aterrizó "de barrigazo" con dificultad en la pista del aeropuerto de Rionegro. La pista estuvo cerrada mientras se cumplía con el procedimiento. Voceros de la Fuerza Aérea confirmaron que la aeronave es un Turbo Commander y que la tripulación siguió todos los procedimientos recomendados para este tipo de emergencias.
La aeronave llevaba, además del Ministro y el Gobernador, a otros cuatro pasajeros y tres tripulantes. Todos salieron ilesos.
El Gobernador de Sucre dijo que volvió a vivir al aterrizar en el aeropuerto de Rionegro, al tiempo que manifestó que durante esos sesenta minutos de sufrimiento recordó el accidente en el que perdió la vida el ex ministro Juan Luis Londoño sobre las montañas del centro del país.
El mandatario aseguró que estuvo a punto de llamar a su familia a contarle lo que estaba sucediendo en el vuelo, pero por recomendación de la viceministra de Protección Social decidieron guardar silencio hasta el último minuto.

description.hltext_display: Dish customers may lose ABC, FOX [The Macon Telegraph, Ga.]
Couture, Boyle score in Sharks' 2-1 win over Oilers
description.content:
Published on December 22nd, 2010
Topics :
Oilers , San Jose Sharks , NHL , SAN JOSE, Calif. , Edmonton , Columbus
SAN JOSE, Calif. - Logan Couture and Dan Boyle scored 3:28 apart in the second period, leading the San Jose Sharks past the Edmonton Oilers 2-1 on Tuesday night.
Antero Niittymaki stopped 26 shots to beat the Oilers for the third time this season and give the Sharks their first three-game winning streak.
Dustin Penner scored for the Oilers, who lost for the third time in four games. Nikolai Khabibulin made 28 saves, but Edmonton's three-game winning streak on the road ended.
Couture scored his fourth goal in three games against fellow NHL rookie of the year contenders Jordan Eberle and Taylor Hall. Eberle had four goals in his previous three games, and Hall had three assists in the Oilers' 6-3 victory over Columbus on Thursday.

description.hltext_display: 惠普Integrity服务器借势融合
description.content:
策略推进应用
2010-12-20 10:14:24 作者：丁常彦出处：比特网责任编辑：ting 分享至微博
12月9日，山东省农村信用社与中国惠普有限公司签署战略合作框架协议，据了解，山东农信将运用惠普“融合基础设施”解决方案，构建全国农信行业第一个云计算管理平台。其中，惠普Integrity动能服务器在构建“融合基础设施”时，提供了强大的支撑。
今年5月份，惠普推出了新一代的Integrity动能服务器。这款基于英特尔安腾9300系列处理器的服务器并不十分强调自身的产品特性，而是紧密结合目前惠普所提的融合基础设施策略。
时隔半年之久，日前，惠普关键业务系统全球市场营销、战略与运行副总裁Lorraine Bartlett与惠普关键业务系统副总裁兼首席技术专家Kirk Bresniker在接受比特网采访时，分享了众多客户的应用案例，从实际应用角度说明了惠普Integrity动能服务器的优势所在。
动能服务器应对数据中心孤岛
在此前惠普发布产品时，惠普就曾表示，基于新的惠普Blade Scale架构上的Integrity解决方案可以跨越不同服务器、存储和网络，这也被惠普认为是Integrity Superdome服务器在十年来的首次重大架构升级。升级后的架构允许客户利用相同的部件、工具和流程，跨越不同服务器、存储器和网络，在同一机箱内并行部署一整套应用程序并对其进行自动化和管理。
正如Lorraine Bartlett所说，目前数据中心中存在很多不同类型的计算孤岛，而惠普新一代Integrity动能服务器正是为了解决不同系统之间的孤岛问题;除此之外，作为针对关键业务的服务器，该产品还能够帮助用户提升系统的可用性，并进一步降低成本。“用户面临着计算需求日益增长的情况下，还希望能通过融合的方式来支撑计算”。
据Lorraine Bartlett介绍，Integrity动能服务器通过与HP-UX系统的结合，大大简化了的IT环境，使得服务器的部署和管理变得更加简单，以满足用户对高可用性和高灵活性的需求。同时，通过虚拟化软件的应用，该系列服务器可以进行动态的调整，这则可以帮助用户实现投资保护和应用环境的稳定，其负载管理功能也可以帮助实现分配资源的高效率。
其中，HP-UX则是一个非常成熟的操作系统，迄今为止已经成功应用了25年。“在上世纪90年代，我们比较关注的创新都是针对单个系统的灵活性的创新，至2000年之后，我们则更加关注针对虚拟环境的创新，并在虚拟环境中实现更高的可用性;现在，随着融合基础设施的提出，我们则希望能够在这个平台上提供更大的创新灵活性。”Lorraine Bartlett说。

description.hltext_display: 飞康CEO:更懂数据保护
description.content:
【引子】从夏恩软件(Cheyenne Software)到飞康软件(Falconstor)，飞康新任CEO James P. McNiel见证了数据保护20多年的发展史，在存储领域走向巨头林立、兼并整合的大趋势下， James P. McNiel带领下的飞康公司会如何面对越来越激烈的市场竞争呢？飞康公司的战略又会发生哪些改变呢？
2010年12月，飞康新任CEO James P. McNiel进行了上任后的首次访华，这期间拜访了飞康中国区的各个客户、OEM合作伙伴、渠道商等外，还首次向媒体宣布了飞康公司全新的战略：Defining Data Protect,Again，随着云计算时代的到来，飞康希望再一次定义云时代下的数据保护!
飞康未来战略核心---品牌化和用户
飞康公司自从2000年成立之后，一直致力于数据保护领域的技术变革与创新，经过十年的发展，以技术见长的飞康公司在OEM合作伙伴中获得了高度的认可，这也是为什么十年间飞康屡次传出被大公司收购的传闻。James P. McNiel作为飞康最新一任舵手，面对这些收购的传闻又会持有何种观点？
James P. McNiel对此明确表示：“飞康公司当前的首要任务为成长我们的业务和帮助解决用户的问题，最近几年，存储市场发生了较多的收购，但是飞康的理想仍然是成为一家强大、独立的软件公司。”
过去的十年，是飞康公司飞速发展的十年。然而，过于依靠OEM合作伙伴的商业模式，也使得飞康公司业务发展遇到一个瓶颈期，如何突破这种过于依靠OEM的业务模式就成为考验新CEO的首要任务。James P. McNiel非常坦诚的认为飞康在产品改进、听取用户需求方面还需要有更大的改进。
James P. McNiel认为：“飞康公司会在策略上做出重大的改变，未来将会加强品牌化的建设和更多的以用户为中心。在品牌化方面，公司未来会把运营方向更多的向品牌化发展，改变过去过于依赖OEM合作伙伴的策略，更多的面向用户推广自主品牌。”
“另外，飞康未来会更多的以用户为中心，这就需要我们的产品更多的贴近用户，过去飞康的产品在技术性上具有领先性，那时我们更多的是研发人员和OEM合作伙伴的意见居多;现在飞康将要改变这种局面，在产品的可靠性、可用性和可管理性(简称：RUM计划)上下功夫。我本人始终相做伟大的产品最好的办法就是聆听用户的心声” James P. McNiel认为飞康今后将更加贴近用户。
图一：飞康新任CEO James P. McNiel先生接受比特网采访。作为飞康新舵手，他用“当你下决心做某事，你必须真诚的承认它的存在。”这句话来阐述飞康启动未来战略的决心！
据了解，飞康公司在一个月之前已经启动了RUM计划，该计划旨在改善研发流程和内部质量管理，让内部员工更加深刻的检讨产品质量。同时，飞康公司已经在北美成立的客户咨询委员会和渠道伙伴咨询委员会，一改过去侧重OEM合作伙伴意见的为主，更多的听取来自用户的反馈。
对于一家致力于独立发展的软件公司，要想在市场上不被吞并、保持独立发展，则需要选择一条最适合自己生存与发展的道路。过去飞康可以依赖着OEM合作伙伴保持业务的快速增长，然而现在的存储市场已经飞速发展，甚至几年以后将超过服务器市场，这也就是为什么IBM、HP、Dell、Oracle等服务器巨头们近年来拼命在存储市场拓展的原因，就连存储巨头EMC公司也多次传出被收购的传闻。中小规模的存储公司必须要有更加准确的领域定位以及长期经营的雄心，才能够在市场上生存下去。那么，在云时代即将到来之际，飞康希望再一次定义数据保护，飞康的数据保护理念和产品又会发生哪些改变呢？
“云时代下，我们更懂数据保护”
“Defining Data Protect， Again”-- James P. McNiel认为这个口号其实就是夏恩软件的一个续集，夏恩软件当年发明了通过网络进行备份的体系架构，首个客户端-服务器存储管理解决方案ARCserve开创了备份/恢复技术领域的先河，至今EMC、Symantec、CA等行业巨头仍然沿用该网络备份体系架构。
事实上，过去传统的备份架构与模式已经越来越不能适应当前企业数据增长的需求，现在企业数据都是PB级的量级，巨大的数据量使得企业在备份思路上跟过去已经完全不同，这也是为什么像重复数据删除技术、快照技术在最近几年获得厂商和用户青睐的原因。与此同时，大数据量必然会给恢复带来巨大的压力，7X24小时的业务连续性要求实质上对备份窗口提出了越来越苛刻的要求;外加上企业用户数据中心逐渐完成服务器、网络、存储虚拟化，使得用户在数据保护上的工作难题提升到了前所未有的高度。
“某种角度来看，数据中心走向全面虚拟化是云计算发展的必然，而这也极大的改变了数据备份体系架构和数据保护理念，今天的虚拟化环境决定了单一硬件载体上集中了越来越多数据和应用。”James P. McNiel认为云的发展极大的改变了数据保护。
而根据飞康方面透露，明年第一季度，飞康公司将升级一系列软件产品，对于飞康公司更重要的是，具有划时代意义、专门针对云环境的下一代产品将在明年正式推出。
James P. McNiel对飞康下一代产品充满期待：“我们要为云、为未来做事情，云计算带来的不仅仅是商业模式上的变革，还给应用、服务等模式带来的革新，传统的IT应用被整合成服务的方式才能够被应用，过去传统的数据保护仍然集中在备份、文件、数据块这些方面，但是事实上，我们忽略了一大事实，随着云计算越来越深入人心，用户的IT部门越来越看重是否能够提供IT服务的可靠性，这才是他们最为关心的。然而我们一些数据保护厂商仍然在谈怎么保护文件、数据块。”
事实上，业内诸多存储软件厂商已经纷纷推出针对云环境的产品，比如Symantec在今年中旬推出了针对云存储的NetBackup Connector和Backup Exec Connector，将OST从物理环境整合到云环境之中;而CommVault在今年推出的最新一代数据管理软件Simpana 9.0，也着重强调了对云环境的数据管理功能……
“公共云有两种，一种是聪明的云，另外一种笨的云。我们会发现，所谓的笨的云其实就是网络大优盘，没有同步、灾备、恢复之后的回切等，这种云只能够存放一些不重要的数据;而聪明的云其实就是带有智能的云，不仅仅需要同步、灾备、回切这些数据保护，还需要应用能够很快的启动、管理界面能够在任何地方浏览等。更为重要的是，云计算环境将无比复杂，而复杂、异构环境下的数据保护正是飞康一直的强项。未来，飞康将在一个界面中管理所有的业务连续业务，通过一个界面来定义针对服务、应用的策略。”James P. McNiel这样阐述云时代下的数据保护理念。
“云时代下，需要独立产品来保护未来”
当前存储领域正迎来一场空前的变革，所有厂商纷纷调整自己的产品与市场思路，要么通过收购弥补技术缺陷、要么通过改变交互方式来满足用户需求。比如说，Symantec公司一改过去以软件交付给用户的模式，推出了软硬件结合的解决方案提供给用户;而EMC、IBM、NetApp、HP则让自己软硬件产品结合的愈加紧密。
人们看到了愈加趋于整合、一站式的解决方案，但无可厚非的是，数据中心经过多年的建设，异构环境这种局面是不会轻易改变的。“我必须明确的是，云计算的复杂性是非常大的，这种异构、复杂环境下的数据管理必然是云计算时代下数据保护的首要挑战。”James P. McNiel表示道。
“对于客户来说，开放的软件平台能够带来更大的价值，这也需要软件厂商在开发成本、技术复杂性上下更大的功夫，而在指定硬件上来开发软件是相对容易多的，这种软硬件捆绑必然会对客户架构带来巨大的限制。举个例子，如果为了保存在EMC阵列上的数据，只能通过购买EMC的数据保护产品，那用户将会被严重限制，独立的软件解决方案其实就是帮助用户从锁定中解放出来。”James P. McNiel认为独立的产品才适应云时代下的发展。
云存储的出现颠覆了传统数据保护的一些理念，有些厂商甚至大幅调整产品线来“迎接”这种颠覆，比如说NetApp公司，从2009年开始即停止了VTL产品的研发。NetApp认为数据保护已经到了D2D的时代，NetApp大中华区系统技术及专业服务部总经理冯诚昌在今年SNW大会上就向笔者表示：“NetApp认为备份不一定非要用到VTL，VTL是一种中间层的产品，是为了磁带使用方便，未来会被套牢，NetApp认为D2D的方式在将来会更加有效，更加能体现业务的需求。”(详情请见：比特网独家分析：2010 SNW 中国大会采访记)
飞康显然并不认同NetApp这种观点，James P. McNiel对此表示：“云计算的到来，意味着需要真正的保护未来，可以确定的是，数据生命周期会远远超过我们的想象。过去，用户已经在传统备份上投入了大量的资金和精力，并且用户的数据保存时间一定会非常长。十年之后，当我们再在这里讨论数据保护时，一定会发现仍然会有很多用户使用磁带保护数据，磁盘保护数据并不会有足够长的生命周期。最简单一个例子，未来出现光磁带，那NetApp将怎么办？”
飞康认为真正的数据保护会是磁盘—近线—云服务的异地备份，理解用户在传统备份上的投资非常重要，需要厂商们提供一个数据迁移方案来解决过去那些挑战。
持续支持飞康中国的发展
最近几年，飞康在国内取得了众多成绩、在金融、保险、证券、制造、教育、医疗等行业都获得了大量的客户，James P. McNiel对中国市场会有何期待呢？
对此，James P. McNiel表示：“中国是飞康战略中非常重要的一部分，过去飞康中国取得了非常出色的成绩，我本人也保证飞康中国将继续获得总部的支持，我们会从中国获取的大部分利润反投入中国业务的发展，并且还将持续扩大中国研发机构，同时，会更多的听取中国用户的需求和声音!”
最后，James P. McNiel用一个月球送人的例子来比喻数据保护工作：“数据保护和月球送人具有同样的道理，把人送上月球是相对容易的，但是更关键的是如何安全的送回来，数据保护是一样的道理，这就需要下一代数据保护产品需要像岩石一样坚硬可靠。飞康的产品在性能和功能已经非常出色，我们将进一步提升产品的稳定性，使得它们能够适应适应云时代的需求。”

description.hltext_display: Sharks Tie Longest Winning Streak
description.author: San Jose Sharks Staff
description.content: Tuesday nights 2-1 victory against Edmonton had a few sub plots, but the most important result was the victory which gave San Jose three wins in a row, tying the clubs season best streak. San Jose had been focusing on stringing together multiple victories and they werent shy in discussing it. I think were turning a corner right now and that is our longest winning streak of the year, Logan Couture said. Weve got one more game to go before this Christmas break, so weve got to focus on Phoenix. I want to go in and Im sure everyone else in this room wants to go in with four straight wins at the Christmas break. We talked about putting a string of wins together here, Dan Boyle said. We should have won three on the road, but now weve won three in a row. We really want to win this next one. It would be the first time weve won four in a row. ROOKIE BATTLE Going head to head with two of the NHLs top four scoring rookies, Couture showed why he is the leading candidate for the Calder Trophy at this time. He scored his 18th of the season and now leads all NHL rookies in goals and points (18-7=25). He has four goals in his last three games and has 10 in his last 11 contests. The game was a scoreless draw when Couture drove himself behind his defender and tapped in a Ryane Clowe pass. You cant ask for a better pass, Couture said. I dont know how he did it, full reach on his backhand and tape to tape. Not too many players in this world can make passes like that. Im fortunate to have him on my line. All the credit goes to him on that goal. I just had my stick on the ice. For as much as Couture glowed about the assist, Clowe had no problem again talking about the play of his linemate. I must have answered that question about 800 times, but Ill answer it again for sure, Clowe laughed. As you see tonight, he caused a turnover and drove and got a goal. Ive said hes one of my favorite guys Ive ever played with and Ive played with a lot of guys. Were in sync in our own end. Couture started the offensive attack with a defensive play. I stripped it from him and Clowe was flying and got behind their D men, Couture commented. Thats a beautiful pass. Everyone is raving about the Sharks leading goal scorer and it doesnt matter that hes a rookie. Hes been playing so good and hes so smart for his age, Boyle said. Hes a two-way player. He can do it at both ends and it was nice to see him score that goal. Hes really grown and matured. Seeing him play this year, hands down I think hes been the best rookie this year. CLOSE Antero Niittymaki came within two minutes of recording his first shutout as a Shark. He made the saves when he needed to. Obviously the one that got by him, I dont think he saw, Boyle said. I thought Niitty was great tonight. He was really sharp, Clowe said. I thought in the second there were a couple of point blank chances and he was really poised in there. You can tell hes in rhythm. DOWN TWO The Sharks may have been up two goals late, but it was their success down two men that allowed them to jump into the lead. The penalty killers and Niitty did a great job on that, Couture said. As the first penalty was terminated, Couture was sprung on a breakaway. He was hauled down and, while no penalty shot was awarded, the ensuing penalty eliminated the second Edmonton power play. Five-on-three you want to put a little pressure on them, Couture said. I thought it should have been a penalty shot, but they called the penalty and Ill take that. BEST EVER Dan Boyle has played just over two seasons in San Jose, but in that time he has become the Sharks all-time leading power play scoring defenseman. With his second period power play tally, Boyle surpassed Brad Stuarts 16 power play markers. OILERS HEAD COACH TOM RENNEY We had four turnovers on our 5-on-3. And that tells you that were trying to do something thats not there. In a 5-on-3 you set up for the payoff skill and thats the shot. And we didnt do that with any kind of authority at all. That sort of led to our demise, if you will, and subsequent to that we got into a bit of a track meet in the second period. And not managing the puck properly they were able to get the two-nothing lead. To tell you the truth I thought our fourth line had a lot of stuff going on inside the blue paint. It doesnt look like chances. It doesnt look like its real pretty. I thought the Fraser line was real good at getting pucks deep, getting to the blue paint. Whacking it around. It certainly gave San Jose a little bit more to think about. NEXT GAME San Jose will host Phoenix Thursday at 7:30 p.m. and tickets can be found at the HP Pavilion Ticket Office and at www.ticketmaster.com. The game will be on CSN California, 98.5 KFOX and www.sjsharks.com.

description.hltext_display: Ready, set, go!
description.content:
Investor Darren Weeks has built up an enviable real estate portfolio. But he knows when to get out...and how. Here's his take on having a viable exit strategy.
Before I delve too deeply into this subject, it's important to note that poor property investments rarely happen organically. In many cases, the factor that transforms an otherwise good investment into a bad one is entirely preventable. Sadly, for many of us, preventing our real estate investments from taking a sudden turn for the worse is something that we have had to learn from painful experience.
Like most unpleasant predicaments, the best way to get out of a bad property investment is to avoid getting into one in the first place.
In 1994, while in my mid-20s, I purchased two units in a north Edmonton townhouse complex. Edmonton was still a relatively small market at the time, but I'd heard rumblings from sources I trusted that a boom in the northern Alberta oil industry was on its way that would produce healthy rewards for real estate investors in the region. Owning two units in the heart of oil country was a 'can't miss'... or so I thought.
I purchased each unit for $29,900, if you can imagine. Units 708 and 712 had recently been renovated and were ready to rent. I found tenants for each unit and began awaiting a return that never came. In 1996, I renovated and sold unit 708 for a loss and sold unit 712 below purchase price. It's worth noting that I don't typically remember the unit numbers of past rental properties, but these units caused so much misery that try as I may, I will never forget them.
So, what turned this 'done deal' into a 'dumb deal'? What could I have done differently to have received the return I had anticipated?
The first thing anyone should do before purchasing a rental property is to do your due diligence on your market. This involves looking into fundamentals such as vacancy rates, in-migration, economic outlook, population projections, demographics, neighbourhood trends, etc. In most markets, you'll find some encouraging indicators, but it's imperative that you aren't blinded by any one of them. It takes a collision of fundamentals to make a great investment, not just one or two standalone bright spots.
In the case of my north Edmonton townhouses, I got so lost in my market's sunny economic outlook that I didn't even bother with the rest of the due diligence process. I failed to notice that my complex had a greater than 20 per cent vacancy rate partially caused by low in-migration.
In fact, I bought and sold these rental properties during an extremely rare three-year window where Edmonton's population actually contracted (623,400 in 1994 to 616,306 in 1996). I had a shortage of interested tenants and, as a result, was willing to rent out my units to even the seediest of characters.
Learn the rest of Darren's story by picking up a copy of our January issue, on newsstands now.

description.hltext_display: Frankfurt tem cerca de 60 voos cancelados, mas a tendência é se normalizar
description.content:
Após nevascas que forçaram o cancelamento de 2.300 voos em Frankfurt, espera-se para hoje uma elevação das temperaturas e precipitações em forma de chuva ou geada
Frankfurt: a situação nos demais aeroportos do país é de normalidade
Berlim - Cerca de 60 voos foram cancelados nesta quarta-feira no aeroporto de Frankfurt, em sua maioria como consequência das alterações em outros aeroportos da Europa, mas a tendência para este dia é de normalização do tráfego aéreo.
Leia Mais
21/12/2010 | Em Guarulhos-SP, um terço dos voos decola com atraso
21/12/2010 | Parlamento espanhol aprova orçamento de austeridade para 2011
21/12/2010 | Sindicalista diz que proposta de aéreas é 'provocação'
21/12/2010 | Governo ameaça endurecer com aéreas em caso de greve neste fim de ano
Por volta de 600 passageiros pernoitaram nos beliches instalados nos terminais do aeroporto, o de maior tráfego aéreo da Europa continental.
Apesar disso, a empresa Fraport, gerenciadora do aeroporto, considera que o tráfego aéreo tende a se normalizar e a situação se descongestionará se estiverem certas as previsões meteorológicas mais amenas pelo menos até quinta-feira.
Após as fortes nevascas dos últimos seis dias, que forçaram o cancelamento de 2.300 voos somente em Frankfurt, espera-se para esta quarta-feira uma elevação das temperaturas e precipitações em forma de chuva ou geada.
A situação nos demais aeroportos do país é de normalidade.
No transporte terrestre, a circulação de trens também tende à normalização. A companhia ferroviária estatal, Deutsche Bahn, estima que não haja nesta quarta-feira atrasos ou alterações como houve nos últimos dias.
Para esta quarta e quinta-feira, prevê-se, no entanto, um novo grande fluxo de viajantes, já que começam as férias escolares em vários estados do país, inclusive em Berlim.
Fontes da Deutsche Bahn reiteraram nesta quarta-feira sua recomendação para que os viajantes façam seus deslocamentos, se possível, antes de sexta-feira, já que são esperadas para aquele dia novas nevascas em boa parte do país. EFE

description.hltext_display: Extreme Straßenglätte: Frontralzusammenstoß
description.content: Schwanewede (rgo). Vermutlich aufgrund von extremer Straßenglätte sind am Montagnachmittag auf der Landesstraße zwischen Osterholz-Scharmbeck und Schwanewede zwei Autos frontal zusammengestoßen. Alle vier Insassen beider Fahrzeuge wurden dabei verletzt. Die Polizei hat die Ermittlungen aufgenommen. Unklar ist noch, ob der Renault Scenic, in dem ein 49-jähriger Vater und seine 17-jährige Tochter saßen, auf die Gegenfahrbahn geraten war, oder - wie Vater und Tochter aussagten, die inzwischen das Krankenhaus wieder verlassen haben - der Opel Omega zuerst auf die Gegenfahrbahn schleuderte. An der Unfallstelle war es jedoch extrem glatt. An beiden Pkw entstand wirtschaftlicher Totalschaden. Der Renault Scenic musste mit Hilfe einer Bergungsfirma aus dem Graben gezogen werden. Die Landesstraße 149 war für die Dauer der Unfallaufnahme für rund eine Stunde lang voll gesperrt. Zur endgültigen Klärung des Vorfalls sucht die Polizei nun nach Zeugen; Hinweise nehmen die Beamten der Polizeiinspektion Osterholz unter Telefon 04791/3070 entgegen.

description.hltext_display: ESS: Järjestäytynyt rikollisuus rekrytoi firmoista
description.content:
Järjestäytynyt rikollisuus on kiinnostunut rekrytoimaan jäseniä suomalaisfirmoista, Etelä-Suomen Sanomat kertoo.
Etenkin logistiikan, kaupan ja turvallisuuden alan yritysten työntekijät kiinnostavat rikollisia. Jopa viranomaisorganisaatioista kuten poliisista tai tullista voidaan yrittää hankkia jäseniä, ESS kertoo.
Keskusrikospoliisin mukaan henkilöstön tekemät tai sen myötävaikutuksella toteutetut rikokset ovat yleistyneet kansainvälisesti ja viime aikoina myös Suomessa. Yritysten palvelukseen on hakeuduttu rikollisessa tarkoituksessa tai rikolliset ovat painostaneet henkilökuntaa osallistumaan rötöksiinsä, ESS kertoo.
Yritysten ja julkishallinnon pitäisi varautua nykyistä paremmin omien työntekijöiden tekemiin rikoksiin, KRP varoittaa.
KRP:n mukaan taloudelliset ongelmat ovat suurin syy työntekijöiden tekemiin väärinkäytöksiin. Teknisen valvonnan sijaan yritysten sisäiseen rikosturvallisuuteen voidaan KRP:n mukaan vaikuttaa parhaiten hyvällä henkilöstöpolitiikalla.

description.hltext_display: Tracking School Crime
description.content:
The handcuffs on school safety data have come off, officials said Monday.
For the first time, the Police Department and Department of Education will have to report to the New York City Council on school safety under (Intro 442) legislation approved Monday.
The bill, approved by a vote of 47 to 0, will detail suspensions and arrests by both school safety officers and by police officers. The data will be broken down by race, gender, age and ethnicity and reveal whether the student is an English language learner.
The Department of Education currently reports on school safety to the state, but is not required to detail incidents to the City Council.
"You can go and find a lunch menu," said Councilmember Peter Vallone Jr., a primary sponsor of the bill. "But you can't get a crime report."
The mayor is expected to sign the bill.
School Safety
Supporters of the legislation said the data would be used to shape school safety policy and determine where disciplinary problems emerge.
"Enforcement of these stipulations may reveal whether patterns are developing that require special intervention or demonstrate clear successes which then could be replicated throughout the system," said Sterling Roberson, vice president of the United Federation of Teachers, in testimony before the City Council last week. "And frankly, more transparency keeps everyone honest on safety and discipline, because we know that often there’s a tendency for emotions and preconceived assumptions to run rampant in place of the facts."
Under the legislation, called the "School Safety Act," data on school suspensions will be broken down by school and reported biannually. The Police Department will report data on arrests, summonses or noncriminal incidents on school grounds quarterly. The crime data will be broken down by the city's eight patrol boroughs. Police will have to detail the nature of the incident, including whether it was a felony, according to the legislation.
School safety agents arrested more than 1,100 students last year, according to New York Civil Liberties Union, and the number of school safety agents has increased by 46 percent under the Bloomberg administration -- from 3,600 to 5,200.
In the 2008/2009 school year, one out of every 14 children was suspended, according to the NYCLU.
The Department of Education, which supports the legislation, touts its school safety record. A spokesperson said it is more than willing to share it.
"We support the bill and have worked closely with the City Council and the NYPD to draft it," said a Department of Education spokesperson Marge Feinberg on the bill's passage. "We are proud of our record in making our schools safer. Since the 2000/2001 school year, violent crime in schools decreased by 39 percent."
The legislation's approval comes just one week after a teacher miscarried in the Bronx after trying to break up a school fight.
A plethora of school safety advocates support the legislation, including Advocates for Children, Class Size Matters and Teachers Unite.
While acknowledging the bill is a good first step, Roberson said in prepared testimony the city should strengthen its prevention and intervention programs to solve school violence before it starts.
Advocates, like the New York Civil Liberties Union, have also called for more rigorous training programs for school safety agents. Agents receive 17 weeks of training.
Riverside Center
Also on Monday, the council approved a 3.1 million square foot development project, Riverside Center, on Manhattan's Upper West Side.
The development will include 2,500 units of housing, 20 percent of which will be affordable, 1,500 units of parking, nearly 120,000 square feet of retail space and more than 100,000 square feet of office space.
As part of a compromise on the project, which community members and the area council member see as too big, the developer, Extell Development, will provide funding for the West 59th Street Recreation Center and Riverside Park South. Extell will also build a school in the neighborhood.
"We tried to do all that we could," said Ethel Sheffer, chair of the Riverside Center Working Group in Community Board 7. "It’s a very large development, but we certainly improved it enormously… in terms of bringing it into the community instead of a private enclave."
According to the council, the development is expected to increase the area population by 3 percent.
Discuss this Article

description.hltext_display: Os 12 melhores livros de economia e negócios de 2010
description.content:
Conheça as obras apontadas por críticos do Financial Times como as melhores do ano
Tatiana Vaz, de EXAME.com
foto 1/12
Divulgação
Tags:
Crise, Estratégia, Bancos, Livros, Negociações
Comentários (0)
Para deixar um comentário você precisa se identificar. Escolha um dos tipos de identificação abaixo:
Fazer login com Abril ID ou Fazer login
com Facebook
Fault Lines: como estruturas secretas ainda ameaçam a economia mundial
São Paulo – Eleito o melhor livro do ano pela Financial Times, Fault Lines conta a história dos vários protagonistas da turbulência financeira de 2008. De acordo com o autor Raghuram Rajan, professor de finanças na universidade de Chicago, a crise foi uma conseqüência do uso sem freios do crédito barato em busca de apoio político das classes menos favorecidas. A causa seria, portanto, os salários baixos da mão de obra menos educada e a crescente desigualdade de renda nos EUA.
Rajan foi um dos economistas que ficaram famosos por antecipar a crise financeira e tem um forte viés social na sua leitura do sistema financeiro americano.
Livro: Fault Lines: How Hidden Fractures Still Threaten the World Economy
De: Raghuram Rajan

description.hltext_display: Neige: le transport aérien européen accusé d'impréparation
description.content: Le transport aérien européen était accusé mardi d'impréparation et de manque de transparence vis-à-vis des passagers retenus dans les aéroports, au lendemain des intempéries qui ont provoqué des perturbations jugées "inacceptables" par Bruxelles.

description.hltext_display: Cowon X7: MP3-Player mit großer Festplatte und Touchscreen
description.content:
Bild vergrößern 937 563 http://img4.magnus.de/image-r937x562-C-c7afcd1d-39047205.jpg © Cowon
"Alles ein wenig größer" lautet das Motto beim neuen "X7" des MP3-Player-Spezialisten Cowon.
So besitzt das Gerät unter anderem einen 4,3 Zoll großen Touchscreen mit 480x272 Pixel Auflösung. Der X7 gehört zudem zur inzwischen raren Sorte der Festplattenplayer: Wahlweise ist er mit 120 oder gar 160 GByte Speicher zu haben. In das relativ große Gehäuse passt auch ein entsprechenden potenter Akku: Bei reiner Musikbeschallung soll er über 100 Stunden lang durchhalten.
Neben Audio beherrscht der X7 selbstverständlich auch Video in den Formaten WMV, AVI und ASF. An der Vorderseite ist ein Lautsprecher eingebaut; neben dem herkömmlichen Kopfhöreranschluss bietet er zudem die kabellose Übertragung per Bluetooth. Dank BBE+-Soundtechnologie samt JetEffect 3.0 kann der Nutzer aus 35 Soundeffekt-Voreinstellungen und 4 benutzerdefinierten Einstellungen wählen, per 5-Band-Graphic- Equalizer lassen sich auch individuelle Soundprofile erstellen.
Der mit einem UKW-Radio ausgestattete Cowon X7 ist ab Ende des Jahres in den Farben Schwarz und Weiß erhältlich. Die Preise liegen bei 270 (120 GByte) beziehungsweise 300 (160 GByte) Euro.

description.hltext_display: What does the economy of 2011 have in store?
description.content:
What is your general outlook for the Canadian economy during 2011?
It was clear from the start it would be a fairly slow recovery. During the end of 2009 and the beginning of 2010, growth really picked up enough for most economists to revise up their forecasts.
But the second quarter came in much slower and third quarter will be a slow grind as well. So I think we're back to what we initially thought: that the recovery will be sustainable, but will be fairly modest by historical standards.
The interest rates are still extremely low by historical standards even though they've gone up since the middle of 2010. And at the same time there will still be very strong fiscal policy until the end of the first quarter in 2011, which will continue to create of activity in the economy. We expect that the private sector is going to start to takeover more visibly in 2011 ... So overall we expect private sector spending to pick up, while consumer spending will only have modest gains. We've already seen housing slowing and it won't be contributing to growth in the near term.
What developments do you foresee in the residential resale housing market during 2011?
We've already seen the cooling of activity since the start of 2010, particularly through the spring and the summer, when resales moderated considerably ... That activity that was brought forward is not taking place right now ... Our opinion, for resales at least, there might be some downward pressure at this point but they should stabilize in 2011. We'll start seeing some steady gains during 2011 but, again, they'll be very moderate gains
You have to keep in mind that valuation to a large extent is subjective ... I pay less attention to valuation models and pay more attention to affordability measures, which do indicate there is a bit of stress on the demand side, but nothing flags a major risk. Now, there might be some exception, and Vancouver does come to mind, but generally speaking it's a slightly stressed market overall, but not to the point of screaming that there's an imminent meltdown.
What developments do you foresee in the home construction market during 2011?
New home construction has surprised us in recent months. We thought it would weaken more. Typically it lags the resale market by half a year. Our quarterly forecast lowered starts for Q3 relative to Q2 in 2010 but we should see a gradual improvement during 2011. But that being said I think we're looking at levels during 2011 that would be overall slightly lower than last year because we had a very strong start to 2010. So we'll see moderation in 2011, but it will be stabilizing and upward sloping.
How much of an effect has the introduction of the harmonized sales tax (HST) had on the Canadian real estate market? Will the tax no longer be a factor in 2011?
There appears to be a lot of consensus on the ground level that there is a lot of confusion with the HST with respect to the resale market. Even for homeowners who knew that the actual price of an existing home was not being taxed and that the transaction costs are. The HST is essentially adding the provincial tax on those transactions.
So I think a lot of buyers tried to act before the HST was implemented, which probably contributed to bring some of that activity forward in the first part of 2010, and at the same time it probably brought forward some supply because those individuals who were putting their homes up for sale were the ones who were paying the commissions.
And now that the commissions are being taxed at the provincial level it represents quite a bit of money ... Supply has weakened considerably since the spring of 2010, which may be a result of an HST effect in Ontario and B.C.
Now we're at the stage where I think the HST effect is still causing a bit of turbulence in the market, but moving into 2011, I think it will be behind us. If B.C. goes through a referendum and repeals the HST law that's going to be another round of turbulence ... So it could turn out to be a more prolonged issue.
Do you foresee further interest rate hikes in 2011? Why or why not?
In our view, the Bank of Canada has time to pause and re-evaluate the situation. Inflation is not a threat at this point, so it has the freedom to take its time. But by the end of the first quarter of next year, we think the economic data is going to confirm that recovery is indeed being sustained and that the Canadian economy will no longer need emergency-type interest rates.
So we're expecting the Bank of Canada to raise the interest rate another 125 basis points. So by the end of the year we're looking at 2.25 per cent in the overnight rate, similarly for five-year bond rates, we're expecting some moderate increases as well. Nothing sharp, nothing that would threaten the housing market, but certainly in our view it will be trending up.
There were problems that were created in the past by having too much liquidity out there. And you don't want to run the risk of fostering asset bubbles because credit is too easy to get. So generally speaking when you don't need such low interest rates, you take them away. Right now the domestic economy doesn't look like it needs that much monetary stimulus anymore, but the
Bank of Canada is taking a very cautious approach because of the uncertainty caused by the global economy.
Will the government need to continue using fiscal policy to stimulate the economy?
At that stage in Canada, we don't think the economy needs anymore fiscal stimulus ... The large federal infrastructure program is going to expire at the first part of the first quarter and there still is some concern that the country may need a follow-up act to sustain that activity. So I think a cautious approach is warranted. But the base-case scenario in our view does not require further fiscal stimulus.
For a more in depth analysis of the 2011 market, pick up a copy of our January issue, on newsstands now.

description.hltext_display: Lluvias empiezan a ceder
description.content:
Bogotá. Las lluvias le están dando tregua al país e incluso se está reduciendo el nivel del río Magdalena.
El director del Ideam, Ricardo Lozano, expresó que los departamentos del Valle, Cauca, Nariño y el Eje Cafetero deben seguir en alerta ante posibles deslizamientos y emergencias. Explicó que la reducción en las aguas se debe a que el Fenómeno de 'La Niña' llegó a edad adulta, pero se extenderá hasta mayo de 2011. "Tuvimos los grandes aguaceros de Cúcuta y Bucaramanga que fueron excepcionales, lo mismo en el Valle del Cauca, pero en el país las lluvias se están reduciendo y eso se está viendo reflejando en la reducción del río Magdalena".
Añadió que "esperamos que la última semana de diciembre entremos en la temporada de menos lluvias, pero 'La Niña' está en su etapa madura, llegó a sus niveles máximos y ahora empieza una etapa de debilitamiento".
Por el desbordamiento del río Magdalena el departamento del Atlántico es uno de los graves del país.
Requieren 10 días de verano
El ministro de Trasporte, Germán Cardona Gutiérrez, expresó que sólo con un par de días de verano se podría restablecer el paso en varias vías afectadas.
En este momento hay 266 pasos restringidos en carreteras nacionales, departamentales y municipales y 50 vías con cierre total por el fuerte invierno.
Los más críticos son los departamentos de Caldas, con 8 vías cerradas, Norte de Santander, con 8 vías; Santander con 7 vías y Antioquia con 4 vías.
Según el Ministro, las obras que se adelantan en las vías son insuficientes, pues en muchos casos cuando ya se ha logrado restablecer el paso, el invierno vuelve y provoca nuevos deslizamientos y derrumbes.
"Si nosotros tuviéramos diez días de verano estamos seguros que podríamos dar vía casi que por el 80 por ciento de esos sitios", dijo

description.hltext_display: Unfallflucht: Polizei erbittet Hinweise
description.content:
Schwanewede (syw).
Nach einer Unfallflucht am vergangenen Freitag in der Stettiner Straße erbittet die Polizei unter der Rufnummer 04209 / 91469115 Hinweise. Zwischen 7.30 und 8 Uhr soll ein Fahrer, der vermutlich in Richtung Posener Straße unterwegs war, mit seinem Wagen gegen einen am Fahrbahnrand geparkten grünen VW Passat gefahren sein, wobei der linke Außenspiegel beschädigt wurde. Ohne sich darum zu kümmern, fuhr der Unfallverursacher weiter, an dessen Wagen der rechte Außenspiegel vermutlich beschädigt wurde.

description.hltext_display: Martin leads Rockets past Warriors
description.content: Oakland, CA (Sports Network) - Kevin Martin scored 30 points and pulled down five rebounds, as the Houston Rockets held off the Golden State Warriors, 121-112, at Oracle Arena. Luis Scola added 20 points, nine boards and six assists for the Rockets, who have won three in a row and five of six overall. Shane Battier chipped in with 14 points and five assists. Monta Ellis poured in 44 points and dished out seven assists for the Warriors, who have lost nine of 10. David Lee tallied 19 points and six rebounds. Golden State guard Stephen Curry missed his fifth straight game with an ankle injury. "We have to stay focused as a team and hopefully get over this hump," Ellis said. "We have a couple of guys still down, key guys, but we're competing. It just didn't come out our way." Trailing by two, 96-94, with 6:10 to play, the Rockets put together a 21-7 run to claim victory. Martin got the surge started with a layup and three-pointer. Scola then made a hook shot to give Houston a 101-96 edge with 3:56 remaining. Ellis made a jumper and Lee recorded a three-point play around Martin's slam to pull Golden State within two, 103-101, with 3:07 left. Battier made a three-pointer to spark a 7-0 Houston flurry. Kyle Lowry and Martin each made two free throws during the small burst to give the Rockets a 110-101 lead. After Reggie Williams made a pair of free throws for the Warriors, Battier made a shot from beyond the arc and Martin made two foul shots for a 115-103 game with 51.2 seconds to go. The first quarter ended in a 26-26 tie, and Houston led 50-46 at the half. The Rockets led by as many as 10 in the third, but took an 81-75 margin into the fourth. The Warriors started the fourth on a 16-6 run to take a 91-87 lead with 8:05 remaining. Game Notes The Rockets have won 14 of 19 and 15 of the last 21 meetings between the teams...Houston made 26-of-34 shots from the charity stripe, while Golden State made 19-of-27...Lowry had 13 points and eight assists.

description.hltext_display: China replaces top Foreign Ministry official
description.content:
China has replaced its top Foreign Ministry official amid a trend toward greater assertiveness in handling territorial disputes and participating in global organizations.
Vice Foreign Minister Zhang Zhijun took over recently as the ministry's Communist Party secretary, state media reports said Wednesday, meaning he outranks Foreign Minister Yang Jiechi. Yang was accused of being caught off guard when U.S. Secretary of State Hillary Clinton announced at a security conference in Vietnam this year that Washington considered the peaceful resolution of South China Sea disputes as part of the American national interest.
Zhang, 57, had served almost his entire career in the party's International Liaison Department, a type of shadow Foreign Ministry focussing on contacts with foreign political parties, until he became deputy to Yang last year.
That party background may mean he has more of a say in policymaking than his predecessor, as China increasingly abandons its former low-key approach to dealing with the outside world. The country's rising economic clout amid the global economic downturn that has battered traditional powers such as the United States has emboldened Chinese leaders to demand a bigger say in global affairs such as climate change and at international organizations, including the United Nations.
China's aggressive assertion of its territorial claims in the South China and East China seas have, meanwhile, sparked a backlash from other countries in the region, drawing them closer to Washington.
The powerful People's Liberation Army is believed to be leading the calls for a tougher line in such disputes, while other cabinet officials have emphasized quietly advancing China's interests in economic, media and cultural spheres.
China's most senior diplomat, State Counselor Dai Bingguo, is seen as balancing the different arguments, although the country's opaque political system ensures that such debates almost never make it into the public arena.
Little is known about Zhang's personal style, although his party background and relative lack of experience working abroad suggest he will closely reflect the tone set by the party leadership.
Zhang's appointment was announced on official websites, including that of the party's People's Daily newspaper, but no exact date was given.
He takes over from Wang Guangya, a courtly career diplomat who was ambassador to the U.N. from 2003-2008, during which China took advantage of the U.S. preoccupation with Iraq to quietly expand its diplomatic space.

description.hltext_display: 韓日中が標準協議体発足、国際標準を共同開発
description.content:
聯合 12月22日(水)14時3分配信 【ソウル22日聯合】韓国と日本、中国が21日、北海道・札幌で3カ国官庁局長級による標準協議体発足署名式を行い、初の標準協力会議を開いた。協議体結成は、3カ国首脳が5月に出した「標準協力に関する共同声明」を受けた措置となる。
知識経済部の技術標準院が22日に明らかにしたところによると、3カ国は今後、局長級標準協議体の会議定例化、国際標準の共同開発、民間専門家の交流活性化、北東アジア標準協力フォーラムの拡大・改編事業などを進めることで合意した。特に、三次元（3D）対応テレビや電気自動車など、未来の世界市場をリードする分野では、国際標準の研究から制定に至るまで緊密に協力することで意見を同じくした。
【関連記事】韓日中が協力事務局設置協定署名、3カ国協力強化へ初の韓国国際クルーズ船運航へ、韓日中ロ航路を計画最終更新:12月22日(水)14時3分

농림수산식품부 서해어업지도사무소(소장 김규진)는 22일 목포 국가어업 지도선 전용부두에서 첨단 시설을 갖춘 500t급 무궁화 5호 취항식을 열었다. 453t, 선령 31년의 노후 지도선 대체 선박으로 건조된 무궁화 5호는 길이 62m, 너비 9m, 깊이 4m이며 최대 속력 20노트로 기동성이 우수하고 위성항법장치, 위치 추적 레이더, 전자 해도, 야간감시 시스템을 갖추고 있다.
또 속력 45노트급의 어업지도용 고속보트 2대를 탑재한 첨단 국가 어업지도선이다.
김규진 소장은 "무궁화 5호는 서해 배타적 경제수역(EEZ)에 배치해 주변국(중국)과 어업협정 이행사항 지도 및 중국어선의 우리 담당 수역 내 감시활동 등의 역할을 하게 된다"고 말했다.
